title: First Staycation But Not The Last!
review: Good first impression during a very short stay! The hotel is located near Universal Studios where on Kirkman Road and Major Blvd, there are many restaurants to choose from. The well-lit and airy lobby opens into the breakfast area. At front desk Mitesh welcomed me as Choice Rewards member and politely asked my preference for a beverage and snack or extra points, which I appreciated. My special room requests were also honored which made me feel like a special guest. Parking is free. My room was a very large one-bedroom suite with a let out sofa, microwave, mini frig, iron, ironing board and single coffee maker, etc. The appliances looked new and were very quiet. I liked the efficient use of space and plenty of electrical outlets for multiple devices. Along the longest wall were three areas that could be used for desk space including an extra roll out table. In addition to the usual mini soaps, bottles of shampoo, lotion, etc. in the bathroom, there were other little extras like a shower cap and surface wipes throughout the room. The bath tub was somewhat narrow but not an issue if just shower and do not bathe. I usually post pics of my hotel room before I unpack but having a hotel room that looks just like the hotel website pictures lends credibility to the hotel and my room did just that. My room, bed linens and floor were very clean and there were plenty of towels and pillows. The bed was very comfortable making for a good night's sleep. Check out with a very friendly Sandy was effortless. She was great! This was our very first staycation here but will not be our last.…

title: Business Overnight / Meeting Room
review: Staff was friendly and helpful. Hotel was very close to attractions. Room was clean and comfortable. I needed to use the meeting room for a business meeting and everything worked out just fine. Looking forward to returning soon.

title: Discrimination
review: This morning my husband and I walked in to get breakfast and the employee ask us can I help you? And I said we don’t need any help. The employee came out from behind the front desk and started to watch us following us making me and my husband feeling uncomfortable. The employee wears glasses and has dark brown or black hair. A guest shouldn’t have to be feeling uncomfortable and watched/followed. This is unacceptable and wrong. I will not stay here anymore.

title: Would recommend
review: Dear tina407_1   Thank you for taking the time to share your comments. Please accept my sincere apology for making you and your husband feel uncomfortable. I can assure you that the concerns you've raised have been addressed, and the appropriate action has been taken. Should you like this discuss further, please contact me by phone at 407.363.1967 or email hguerrero@buffalolodging.com, I want to make things right for you.   Thanks.

title: Great location for Universal
review: We really liked this hotel, the staff, especially Mario on reception, were so nice. Rooms very comfy and good choice of breakfast. We walked to and from universal studios every day which was about a mile and a bit (20 mins) each way.  Pool was lovely and pool towels provided.

title: Very large comfortable room.
review: The hotel room was quite big and the beds very comfortable.  The included breakfast was more than adequate.  The pool, which was mostly empty, was clean and enjoyable.  My grandson guessed the water temperature to be about 88°f and not refreshing but I found it wonderful.  The staff were always ready to help.

title: Eh....
review: Dear Beverley J  Thank you for your great review. I will make sure to share with my staff on our next huddle, It is always a pleasure to receive great feedback.

title: Nice visit
review: This hotel has really great reviews. However, I can’t share the same enthusiasm for this hotel.   I was in Orlando with my family post cruise and we were going to spend a couple of days at Universal Studios. We chose this hotel because we remembered staying a couple of years ago. At that time it seemed new, clean and it is very close to Universal. Well, all I can say is it remains close to Universal. The room seemed tired and worn which took away from it sense of cleanliness. I think it is time for a refurb. I was not impressed this visit and may opt to stay somewhere else. However, the staff was pleasant.

title: good values
review: Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel, your opinion is very important to us. It saddens me to read your stay was less than satisfactory, please accept my sincere apology for not meeting your expectations, I can assure you our staff takes great pride in providing a clean, comfortable and worry-free stay, and what you experienced is not the norm. I would like you to know that nothing is more important to us than to regain your trust, and we all hope you will allow us to welcome you back to our hotel again soon and provide you with the positive Comfort Suites Experience you have come to expect from us. I thank you for your feedback, and if I can be of further assistance or would like to discuss further do not hesitate to e-mail or call me personally.

title: Nice location to universal.
review: The customer service at this hotel is excellent.  I had a small issue but they corrected it right away.  The breakfast is really good, more than the standard at most hotels. The room was clean. I will go here again.

title: Great location, perfect price, wonderful staff
review: We stayed at this hotel during a recent trip to Disney World that we booked through Southwest vacations.  I was a little skeptical, but was more than pleasantly surprised when we arrived.  It is definitely not a high end hotel, but it met all of our needs.  Very clean, friendly and helpful staff, comfortable beds, and a refrigerator and microwave in the room.  Complementary breakfast was the icing on the cake.  Don't overlook this little gem.

title: Cancelled stay that wasn't really cancelled.....beware...
review: Thank you for your review and choosing our hotel. Can’t wait to welcome you back!!

title: Perfect location for theme park trips
review: Firstly, this is only the 2nd negative Hotel review I've written in 30+ years of travelling and oddly, I'm writing about a Hotel that until recently, was a favourite place of mine to stay when holidaying in Orlando, having had great stays here 4 or 5 times in the last 10 years or so. This summer we had planned to stay again and called the Hotel directly to see if we could get their best price for 3 rooms for 2 weeks, given the price had gone up in recent years and the dollar-sterling rate had made 3 rooms quite expensive. I spoke with a female at the Hotel - I believe the general manager, and I was quoted an incredibly cheap rate for the 3 rooms for 2 weeks. 3 or 4 times during the call, I questioned the rate, since it seemed to cheap and asked whether this was really the 3 room…

title: We loved it!
review: Dear AJG502014  I am terribly sorry to read about your experience regarding your booking and cancellation. It is not often that we receive negative feedback as our team strives to provide the best level of service to our guests. What you experienced is not the norm, please contact me directly to 407-363-1967 to discuss further.   Thanks.

title: close to universal
review: This was the first time staying at this location and I was very happy with everything. This hotel is super close to universal studios. They have plenty of choices nearby for food. Breakfast was good and had a large assortment to choose from. Will definitely be staying here again!

title: Easy access location
review: Easy access location  Close to Universal and sea world and not much further to Disney. but take the Palm Parkway interstate four is a mess right now   the rooms are in need of carpet and the bathroom needs a total overhaul especially the two dollar toilet seats ouch    The breakfast is standard but very good for free and the people were some of the best

title: Pleasant stay.  Like that it's across the street from Universal Studios park
review: Thank you for taking the time to post your feedback, your opinion is very important to us. I am truly disappointed to read we did not meet your expectations. Our staff takes pride in the cleanliness and maintenance of our hotel and it troubles me that we may have missed that many things in one room. We greatly appreciate your feedback on this matter and will make sure the room you were in is inspected by out Housekeeping and Maintenance managers and steps are taken to fix and repair whatever needed to alleviate such issues in the future. Again, thank you for your valuable time and we look forward to having another opportunity to be your choice of hotel on your next visit to Orlando.

title: Family reunited
review: Was a pretty pleasant stay.  I would just recommend fans in any hotel bathroom, which they didn't have. Breakfast hours are very convenient.  Clean facilities.  Nice hot tub and pool.  Exercise room was better than average.

title: Not impressed
review: Thank you for your feedback and taking the time to post your comments, your opinion is very important to us. I am glad to read you had a pleasant stay and enjoyed some of our amenities such as our daily breakfast, hot tub, pool, and exercise room, however I am truly sorry the exhaust fan was not operational. Please accept our sincere apology. I have shared this with our Chief engineer, and pre-arrival procedures are being revised. Once again thank you for your feedback. Please come back soon, we’d love to have you here again!

title: Close to everything!
review: We spoke with Sandy the day prior to request an early check in the following day. When we arrived at 10 AM, Sandy had a room ready for us. Sandy was extremely pleasant and accommodating as well as the housekeeping staff. Breakfast was very busy, but always well stocked and clean. The rooms were very clean and beds comfortable and great WIFI connection. Will stay again on our next visit.

title: Great Value for weekend at Universal
review: If you are going to the Universal Parks for 2 or 4 days, this is the place to stay. Price was very economical for how close it is to the entertainment. The rooms were very clean and the staff was friendly and helpful. If there's one thing I have to complain about is how limited the sitting space was for breakfast.

title: Good Base Camp for Universal
review: You are right, this is the best place to stay if you are visiting Universal Studios. We are just around the corner and we also offer a free shuttle to the park. I am truly happy price, cleanliness and our friendly staff made a good impression, however a bit disappointed breakfast sitting was a problem. Please accept my sincere apology for not meeting your expectations, and I hope this does not deter you from visiting us.  Once again thank you for your comments, and I hope we see you again soon.

title: Clean
review: We stayed here for two nights for our day at Universal.  The park is close and there is a shuttle that leaves from the Holiday Inn across the street.   Tip: go over to the holiday inn at 7:00am sharp to get your reservation on the shuttle.  It fills up quick. Room was fine and breakfast was standard.

title: Bombed
review: Thank you for taking the time to write a review regarding your recent stay at Comfort Suites, your opinion is very important to us.  I am happy to read you took advantage of our free shuttle to Universal Studios, we are very lucky to be just steps away, and thank you for your comment regarding the room and breakfast. Once again, we appreciate you sharing your experience with the Trip Advisor family, and we hope next time you visit our wonderful city, we can be your home away from home again.

title: Good Value
review: -Breakfast was your normal  Continental breakfast but was all fresh.  -rooms : we had a 2 bedroom suite and it was enough room for 4 people. Clean, when needed supplies didn't have to wait for them. Stays for 4 nights,  -pool water is cold not heated , it's a hotel not a resort so can't expect it.  -hot tub was warm , last day it was closed down not sure why.  -very close to universal city walk, outlet mall  -bed and pillows where amazing ! Very surprised on how great of sleeps we got

title: Staycation While Remodeling Home
review: I had some well needed work done on my closet that's right net to me shower, so in order to get that done, needed mom safe out of the way while the contractors do their job.   The staff is top notch and very friendly. From the front desk, housekeepers to the breakfast attendants.   Mt main and only real issue is the fact I requested a handicap accessible room but I had gotten a standard room with a rail in the shower. The front desk staff would have done their best to get me a better accessible but it would have been too much of a struggle for me to juggle transferring the luggage and mom, so I made do. I really needed a room for a wheelchair bound guset that was with me (my mother, of course)  Other than that, everything was great. Grounds and rooms were clean

title: Very good hotel
review: Dear pmularz841,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property and let other travelers know of your experience! We know there are many hotels to choose from when traveling to this area and we sincerely appreciate you choosing ours! I'm that room type issue was waked out. May I suggest next time you book your reservation with us, please give a call sometime in advance, we will be happy  to make sure to accommodate your requests the best we can. We hope to be able to welcome you back to our hotel.  Sincerely, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Reasonable hotel in Orlando.
review: A very good hotel with an appropriate price.  Good location, clean, good gym, good attendance. Nice employees.  A very recommendable alternative for those who wants to stay in a good hotel, near the parks, paying a fair price.

title: excellent hotel
review: Thank you very much for taking the time to share your experience during your recent stay at Comfort Suites in Orlando.  I am truly happy our location, accommodations, cleanliness and amenities such as the gym were to your satisfaction. Also, we very much appreciate your wonderful comments about our staff. I will make sure to share with them, is always nice to received positive feedback.  Once again thank you for your comments and recommending our hotel to other travelers. We hope to see you again soon!

title: Do not stay here
review: The room is above average and clean. Amenities are good. Very close to I-4 freeway and other express way also close. A little bit away from various amusement places but that is good. Reason is not clouded this hotel area. Also plenty of free parking is a plus.

title: Affordable Hotel
review: Clean, affordable, close proximity to Universal Studios, close to Wendy’s restaurant (of course better priced food but terrible service), nice and a lot of options with the breakfast bar in the morning.   The only thing I would recommend is that this hotel offer better shuttle options to Universal Studios.  I ended up driving and parking due to the shuttle filling up fast (next door) and you also need to put your name down to reserve spots.  Not very convenient. If you had a shuttle that ran every morning, afternoon and late evening and even charged reasonably for the service... it would be a great option.  The Universal resorts have you beat in this option.

title: Stay someplace else
review: Dear Cougar140,  Thank you for your comments in regards to your recent stay at the Comfort Suites Universal Studios Area. We are glad that you found our room clean, great breakfast, and location convenient for visiting Universal Studios. I hope that the hotel staff provided you with the excellent friendly service. I'm very sorry to read that the complimentary shuttle service was not accommodating enough. The shuttle is owned and operated by Universal Studios, not the hotel, and it’s provided on the first come, first served base. They chose to pick up at the Holiday Inn due to the size of their parking lot and easier maneuverability. The Holiday inn is located right next door in the adjacent parking lot, so its very easy to find. Thank you again for your feedback and we hope to see you again on your next visit to the Orlando area.  Sincerely, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Orlando 2018
review: First had to wait for Shuttle fir an hour, called hotel 3 times, always same answer it us on its way,  it's 2 miles,  next after check in asked front desk for ice machine, i was told as well as another guess checking in on 4th floor venting are by elevator,  went to room changed go to ice machine,  no ice machine, did find other guess looking also, had to go back to first floor only one in building, next morning get up for flight go to take shower nit dressed yet, no towels,  call front desk, they tell me i have to send someone to front desk to gets towels, then after waiting for their Shuttle again, called taxi, staff doesn't care, please don't reward the bad staff by staying here, it's Orlando,  there are many other options

title: Worst breakfast ever!
review: Dear markemalcolm, I wanted to personally thank you for taking the time to review our hotel, our guest’s opinions are very important to us. I can assure you our team strives to offer a clean, comfortable and worry-free stay for all our guests, but I am puzzled about your comments. You mentioned waiting one hour for a shuttle, and lack of ice machines. We do not have a shuttle to the airport and ice machines are on every floor, perhaps you might be mistaking us with another property. Your satisfaction is very important to us, and I would like to sort this out with you personally, so please contact me at 407-363-1967 or hguerrero@buffalolodging.com to discuss further.  Thank you.

title: The Best...None Better!
review: Took a trip to Orlando with my 3 children and husband. The room had 2 beds and a couch . Very spacious. Was clean and no cracks or weird colors in the bathrooms. No odd smells either. The pool was quite and wasn’t huge but not small either. The breakfast was ok for free. They change the menu daily but it consist of cereal , oatmeal, waffles, breads,fruit, some type of sausages and eggs. Coffee/ juice.  I would definitely rebook.friendly staff. My only complaint if I had to is the a/c unit made a thumping noise when shutting down.

title: Stay here if you go to Universal Studios!
review: My family stayed at Comfort Suites for 5 nights while we were in Orlando. There were a few cons & a lot of pros. First the cons... *The beds were too firm in my opinion. I like a softer bed but that's just a personal preference. *The shower head was small, therefore the water pressure was low. Again, that's just another personal preference. *There were stains on the floor all throughout the room. There were multiple stains in front of the mini refrigerator. It made me feel like the floor wasn't clean.  Now the pros... *Housekeeping was very efficient. When we came back from being out all day, the beds were made & we had fresh towels. *The AC worked perfectly! A lot of times when I stay at a hotel, it's either too cold or too hot. This one was just right! *The breakfast had a…

title: Night before we began Disney vacation
review: Dear LL1979  Thank you for sharing such a wonderful and detailed review. First, please accept my sincere apology to you and your family for the rug condition, this is totally unacceptable and be assured it's being addressed.  We appreciate your kind comments of our housekeeping staff and I am glad you enjoyed some of our amenities such as breakfast, kids friendly breakfast area and the free transportation to Universal Studios Theme Park.   We are delighted we met your expectations for the perfect vacation! We hope you are already planning your next vacation with us.

title: Best Service
review: Our family of 5 stayed in two rooms at this Comfort Suites the night before we began our Disney vacation. We arrived near midnight following a 9 hour trip. The hotel was nearly full. When I booked online, there were only 3 rooms left, so we had 2 rooms very near the front desk on the bottom floor. This was less than ideal, but at least we had a room. The lobby and rooms were clean. i would not consider the decor trendy, and the room was a little dated. But, the price was very affordable and near Disney. It was right across the street from Universal for reference. And, it served our purpose. The staff was pleasant. Our big disappointment was we left just as breakfast was being made ready at 6:30 am. I would recommend this hotel for the price due to it's cleanliness.

title: Great Location: Univeral Orlando.
review: Dear kbtbsbbb  Thank you for sharing your review with the Trip Advisor family. I am truly sorry the room location was not to your satisfaction, but as you mentioned, at that time of the night in a sold-out day it's difficult to accommodate, please accept my sincere apology. I wish you could have enjoyed our breakfast but due to our family oriented clientele breakfast runs from 7 am to 10 am daily, however we do offer “Grab and Go Bag” for people who leave before 7 am.  Once again thank you for sharing your experience and recommending our hotel. We hope to welcome you back soon!!

title: Resort Fodder
review: Good staff. Dakoy is exceptional at the front desk and helpful and friendly every time I stay here ( about 40 times). The front desk is responsive and helpful. I would not hesitate to recommend this hotel.

title: Nice Stay
review: This was a quick one night stay! The location was nice, we were able to walk to Universal Studios and take the bus back. The room was spacious and clean. The only downside was quite a bit of mold in the bathroom near the ceiling on the wallpaper due to poor ventilation. Breakfast was just okay.

title: No complaints!
review: Dear sahmom80,  Thank you very much for your comments about your recent quick stay at our Comfort Suites! Your feedback is appreciated and valued. I'm sorry for the bathroom issue, I will make sure to address it with our maintenance department to take care of it. We hope we will be welcoming you back again, maybe for the longer stay, soon!  Sincerely, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Great deal, great location, great time!
review: Arrived here April 16-18. Easy check in. They are doing some remodeling in one of the buildings. The a/c wasn't working in the hallway I think because it was so hot and dusty but I guess because the housekeeper was vacuuming. Room was nice and clean upon arrival.

title: Comfort-able
review: Dear rubil0ve,  Thank you for taking a moment to post your comments. While we really appreciate all of the feedback that we receive, it doesn't appear that your comments addressed to our hotel. Based on you comments you are still in house with us today, April 17th. We are one building hotel and don't have any remodeling or repair projects going on. Also, I just personally walked all 4 floors of the hotel and A/C is working properly in all hallways. In any case, I hope your overall stay in one of the Choice Hotels properties will be comfortable and memorable.   Sincerely, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Nice size Jr. Suite
review: The staff was SUPER friendly and helpful. We stayed there for 2 nights and had a great experience. It's close to Universal and there is a shuttle you can take. It's also not a far walk either as we did walk from the park back to the hotel on our last day. The rooms were clean and everything was functioning properly. Would definitely stay there again! We had a great time.

title: Excellent stay!
review: Friendly staff and easy check in. We stayed in very large room that surpassed my expectations at such a cheap price. Extremely close to Universal and easy to drive to. Very, very clean which is a HUGE plus...not one hair or spot of dirt anywhere in our room. Very satisfied and will stay here again!

title: Orlando fun
review: Dear WanderingGypsyNomad,  Thank you very much for taking the time to post such a great review for our property and share your experience with other travelers. We are glad to hear you had an enjoyable stay and liked our spacious rooms. Another thank you for complimenting  the cleanliness of our hotel, our housekeeping staff work very hard to make sure rooms and public areas are clean and everything is in great condition. Thank you again for choosing our hotel for you visit to Orlando and we hope to be able to welcome you back in the future!  Sincerely, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Great Hotel for Universal
review: Airboat ride in the everglades were AWESOME!!!! The Ale house for lunch!!!  watch out for The geckos!!!!  The hotel was just one mile from universal studios!!!! The weather was fabulous the people were very friendly. Can't wait for my next visit.

title: Very nice
review: Dear by_vbyrom29,  As they say, it is all about location and I am delighted that you enjoyed your time while staying with us! We look forward to seeing you again soon and thank you for your kind words about friendliness of our staff!   Sincerely,  Irina Marsee, General Mamanegr

title: Reasonable hotel very close to Universal
review: This was without a doubt one hassle-free and convenient stay! We were staying a short time (extended weekend), February 3rd-6th and going to Universal each day.   We did not think about our flight getting in so early and realized we wouldn't be able to check-in yet. So we went to eat to kill time and decided to take a chance and head over early and just wait if we couldn't check-in early. The lady that greeted us was super friendly and worked her "magic" as she said and was able to let us check in about an hour early. She gave us all the details about the shuttle to the park and when breakfast was served.   The room was extremely clean and we were surprised at all of the space. There were just 2 of us. There was a microwave and a decent sized mini fridge. We bought some snacks…

title: great location walking distance to Universal
review: nice hotel clean good breakfast, walking distance to universal or free shuttle sometimes we liked to walk back, few decent restuarants  nearby didn't use the pool not warm enough, we had a sofa bed for our daughter would have been nice to have a comforter but there was only blankets available

title: Nice Place to Stay
review: Dear Suezy747,  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience with Trip Advisor community! We are happy you favored our location and complemented on our cleanliness and breakfast! Hopefully, you will return to Orlando some time soon and stay with us, and will be able to enjoy our outdoor pool and spa during the wormer sunny months. I'm glad the sofa bed was comfortable for your daughter, and next time we will be happy to provide additional comforter should you need it, just let us know!   Sincerely, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Great Hotel while visiting Universal
review: My daughter and I wanted to see Harry Potter stuff at Universal for a 3 day week-end.  She found the Comfort Suites to stay at that wasn't really expensive.  I really liked the room. It was very spacious and the beds were very comfortable! The complimentary  breakfast was outstanding! Waffles, eggs, bacon, cereal, toast, muffins - something for everyone!! Would stay there again. My only complaint is that they advertise a free shuttle to Universal but you have to go next door to the Holiday Inn to catch it which wouldn't be a problem but you have to get vouchers to get on board. Seemed like kind of a hassle so we never used it. Used Uber to get around mostly.

title: Great deal
review: Dear kacee1980,  Thank you for your review! We are excited to learn of the great stay you and your daughter had with us during your Harry Potter weekend at Universal Studios. It's great to know our spacious room, comfortable beds, and complimentary breakfast were accommodating and met your needs! I'm sorry to read that you felt the complimentary shuttle service was not accommodating enough. The shuttle is owned and operated by Universal Studios, not the hotel, and it’s provided on the first come, first served base. They chose to pick up at the Holiday Inn due to the size of their parking lot and easier bus maneuverability. The Holiday inn is located right next door in the adjacent parking lot, so it’s very easy to find. Thank you again for your feedback and we hope to see you again on your next visit to the Orlando area.  Sincerely, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Great hotel suites
review: This is a top notch hotel for what some people would call a budget hotel. It is conveniently located extra close to Universal Studios if you’re looking to make a trip there. The hotel was well kept and the staff was helpful. The rooms were spacious and we got a great nights rest. Even the complimentary breakfast was top notch. I highly recommend staying here!

title: Not Bad for Visiting Universal
review: This property is about a mile from the Universal front gate and conveniently located to dining options like Golden Corral. Beds were comfy, but the room could use some updating. Rust and corrosion was visible on the tub fixtures and the shower head was not high enough for a 6 foot tall man to get under without bending down. Water pressure was terrible and I had to flush twice every time I went to the bathroom. Breakfast was really good and the staff did a great job keeping up with the crowd. Didn't have to wait too long for anything and they kept all items stocked throughout the mad morning rush. Front desk staff was also friendly. I would probably stay here again because of the value.

title: Immature management, locked me out of my room, fraud on my credit card!
review: Dear stacman7,  Many thanks for sharing your experience of staying with us. We greatly appreciate your feedback on the services delivered and happy to hear you will stay with us again when traveling to this area. I'm sorry for the water pressure and condition of the bathroom fixtures. I will make sure our maintenance inspect all rooms for this matter and fix any issues like ones you experienced. I greatly appreciate your compliments of our breakfast quality and our breakfast staff for the work well done. I'll make sure to share your comments with all the staff members. We look forwarded to welcoming you back again soon!   Sincerely, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Wonderful Facility, walkable to Universal and no complaints
review: I'd like to start this by saying in my almost 130 reviews, I've only given 1 other hotel a terrible but this hotel is a whole new level of awful. I booked this hotel for 6 nights since it was  fairly close to everything I needed (the convention center and universal). The room was absolutely fantastic...a huge suite with a couch, small kitchen table (perfect for me to work), a mini kitchen area with a fridge and microwave, a huge desk, roomy bathroom, and 2 queen beds. It was amazing until the 3rd day when I came back exhausted from my all day conference and found that my key didn't work and I was locked out of my room. The manager happened to be in the hallway and unlocked it but upon asking my name stated I hadn't paid for the room. Mind you at this point I have almost $1000…

title: Great
review: Dear MelissaClair93,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review for our hotel. We appreciate all the feedback that we receive. We are glad that you found our rooms spacious and comfortable. I regret that we provided you with bad service and a poor customer experience—it is the exact opposite of what we pride ourselves on. We value our customers and understand how important it is to offer exceptional service. I am truly sorry for the credit card issue that caused all the misunderstanding. Please let me assure you it was not our intention to upset or inconvenience you. My staff and myself tried really hard to resolve the billing issue with your credit card company, who verified during the conference call that it was a system glitch with authorization that they showed approved, but on our end it was declined, but we were able to rectify the error while on the phone with them.  I regret that the hotel providing a free night lodging and 15,000 points to your Choice Privileges account was an unsatisfactory response to your inconvenience. Ones again I sincerely apologize that we failed to meet and exceed your expectations.  Please contact me directly so I can offer you the satisfactory resolution and find the way to keep you as our customer. I look forward hearing from you soon.   Sincerely, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Great Room, Rates & location to Park
review: I booked my vacation directly with Universal, specifically with this hotel due to it's reviews and the fact that is is walkable to the City Walk.  It did not disappoint. First the room was immaculately clean. I saw the maids working together cleaning rooms and they really acted as a team.   The room was  huge! My deal with Universal was for the standard two queen beds and it was their cheapest option.  It could fit 6 people easily.  I loved the gadget charging station, work desk that expanded into two tables. Nice sized frige, coffee maker, and microwave.   Parking is easy with ample parking. Easy check in and check out. Their front desk staff were friendly and informative. They were a wealth of knowledge.  Lastly, breakfast was great. Waffles, pastries and fruit are pretty…

title: Would stay again
review: This was our first time staying at the hotel.  The room was very clean.  The bathroom was clean but the tub needs to be updated.  The grit on the bottom of the tub was not good for someone who wants a tub bath.  I know the grit is so the bottom won't be slick but there are better ways to do that.  The desk personnel was awesome.  They went way of their way to help up with a taxi and information that we needed.  I would definitely stay there again.

title: Halloween Horror Nights Trip
review: Dear irbenton,  Thank you so much for your lovely review about your recent stay at the Comfort Suites Orlando. We are glad to know that the efforts of our friendly team had paid off in making your stay a satisfying one! I will be sure to share your comments with the team, as it will definitely motivate the team to continuously improve on the quality of our services. Thank you again for your feedback, we hope to see you soon!   Sincerely, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Fantastic Experience
review: Loved this hotel and trip Check in was great and room was very spacious and clean-We were visiting universal late for horror nights so we wanted something close and quick to the park one traffic light and we were at the garage. Plenty of quick food places open late and within walking distance to the park. Breakfast was great to nice hot food and always full with fresh food like eggs and sausage. Would stay here again for sure for my next trip. Only other thing was the Wifi in this hotel seems very bad would always drop maybe was a bad connection for the hotel but at times I had to go to my data to have connection.

title: Did not follow FEMA law after Irma
review: Dear J R,  We are pleased to read that you had an enjoyable stay and loved the accessibility of our hotel to nearby attractions and eateries, in addition to the services and amenities of our hotel. I am sure that fellow travelers would benefit from your detailed review as well. We look forward to seeing you soon!  Bert regards, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Family Vacation 2017
review: We were forced to evacuate our home near Tampa On the Thursday before hurricane Irma hit Florida.  We needed to find refuge and had a difficult time since we were traveling with 2 dogs.  At that point, all pet friendly hotels across Florida and other states were booked.  Miraculously, we found Comfort Suites in Orlando on a pet friendly hotel search.  We asked what the pet policy was and what the added costs were.  They explained to us that they are typically not a pet friendly hotel, but made an exception to help accommodate those who were in need.   From the moment we arrived until we checked out, each and every member of the staff was professional, courteous and went out above and beyond for each and every guest.  We were amazed that a staff that is not used to accommodating…

title: Best hotel for the theme parks
review: Always super clean and well kept. Hotel staff always helpful and friendly. Hotel rooms always in great condition and super clean. Quick drive to the theme parks (literally within walking distance) amazing breakfast in the morning. Zero complaints from my last visit

title: Excellent location!
review: Dear Robert G P,  Thank you so much for taking the time to write a review for our hotel. I am thrilled that you had such a great experience with us! It sounds like it was not your first time staying with us, and we are so grateful for your loyalty to our hotel and love having you as our guests! We look forwarded to welcoming you back again soon!   Best regards, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Great for the price!
review: The hotel is very well located for Universal Studios and the attractions of International Drive. Not too bad for Disney either. It was clean and very well maintained. Rooms were nice and the bathroom was a great size. Beds were very comfortable.  Breakfast was good with a great selection each day (we stayed for three days). We had a microwave and coffee machine in our room. Would have been nice to have milk available as we only had creamer which is horrible in tea.   The pool area was clean and well maintained. Towels were provided and there was a good amount of shade/seating. The gym suite was well equipped for the size of the hotel. Bonus points for providing earphones as I'd forgotten mine. TV was poor quality but that's not important as I have music.   My biggest criticism…

title: Great Hotel
review: Dear SophiePeckham,  Thank you very much for taking the time to post your detailed and very informative review of our hotel. We are glad to hear that you found our hotel location and amenities favorable!  We know there are many hotels to choose from when traveling to this area and we sincerely appreciate you choosing ours! Ones again I would like apologize to you for the inconvenience and frustration the issue with the parking caused you. Be assured that we are sharing your concerns with all appropriate management and staff members so that corrective measures are taken where feasible. You are a valued customer to us and we appreciate your business. We all hope that you will give us the opportunity to welcome you to our hotel again in the future and provide you with the exceptional Comfort Suites experience and superior service of our staff members.  Best regards, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Comfortable stay
review: You can't beat the price for what you get with this hotel  - Friendly staff - clean and spacious room - hot breakfast with enough seats every morning,  - free parking,  - free shuttle to Universal Studios - we had a fridge and a microwave in our room - free wifi.....near everything, highly recommend!

title: Great stay
review: Very comfortable, clean room had an extra couch sitting area that turned into a twin size bed loved that!  Contintintial breakfast was busy but good great waffles, scrambled eggs, sausage, yogurt, fruit and an assortment of breads we were very pleased . I would definitely stay here again!

title: Good price
review: Dear Kellie M,  Thanks for your review of our Comfort Suites Orlando Universal Studios Area. Our super spacious rooms are very accommodating and pull out sofa bed does come in handy with larger families. We are so pleased that you were able to enjoy our complimentary hot breakfast in the morning. We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to seeing you again in the future.   Sincerely, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Excellent and comfortable
review: Little hard to find but with the gps we found it . The room was nice and clean and they have a decent breakfast 😊The pool was nice and cool on a very hot and steamy day (the hot tub was being work on ). All in all it was a good stay 😎

title: Perfect for us
review: Dear Cindy L,  Thank you for your feedback and taking the time to post your comments. I'm pleased to read that you had a good satisfying stay with us. Thank you for your understanding and patience while we undergo the hot tub repair. Hope that you find your way back to our hotel on your next trip to Orlando in the near future.  Sincerely, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Everything you would expect
review: Five of us stayed here two nights and found it very comfortable and pleasant. The staff were very nice. The breakfast was also excellent, plentiful, and the staff person worked very, very hard to please! Much appreciated!!!

title: OKAY stay
review: For price of hotel you got all your basic needs. Room was clean, and breakfast was good. Did not spend much time in hotel so did not really care how fancy it was just wanted it to be clean (which it was). Stayed here for a Disney trip for 5 nights. Was not big fan of location (was right off highway). Our party got lost many times trying to find hotel.... (did not help we were from a small town and not used to big highways). There is a TGIF restaurant next to hotel which is good. Our party just wished we were closer to Disney and or in a more tourist location. Overall was a good hotel. Would stay at hotel chain again just at different location.

title: Great for Universal Orlando vacation
review: Dear kfoss8,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property. We are glad to hear that you found our hotel clean and comfortable. I am sorry to hear that our location was not very convenient for you while visiting the Disney Theme Park. While our location is not the closest one to Disney parks, we are just 3/4 of a mile from Universal Studios Resort, City Walk, and International Drive area. Hopefully if your next vacation to Orlando will be to visit Universal Studios we will be the hotel of your choice for accommodations.  Sincerely, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Best Stay For Universal
review: Very close to Universal Orlando - we walked to the park each day.  Very large rooms and very clean.  Great breakfast to start your day before visiting theme parks.  My sons also enjoyed the pool/hot tub 2 of the days.

title: Amazing customer service, CLEAN, and great beds
review: Dear UStraveler16,  Thank you for taking a moment to post your comments about our hotel, we really appreciate all of the feedback that we receive. I am glad to see that you enjoyed the cleanliness of the hotel, convenience of our location, and amenities our property offers. Thank you so much for staying with us and we hope to see you in the near future.  Sincerely, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Very neat and clean
review: We stayed four nights during the first week of May for a short getaway to Orlando. The hotel was perfect!  It is located on a very quiet side road right off of I-4 and less than five minutes to the parks. It is so convenient to Universal, you would think you were staying on their resort property.   We were able to check in early at 1:30 p.m. and the desk clerk could not have been nicer. The room was extremely clean and the bed was one of the most comfortable I have ever slept in at a hotel.  The breakfast was also very good, with plenty of variety and different items each morning. It can get a little busy at times though.  The only issue we had was with other guests slamming their doors at night, but that's no fault of the hotel. Every hotel employee we came in contact with was…

title: Spring Break
review: Very clean hotel. I was impressed by the cleanliness and professionalism of the staff. The hotel was easily assessable to Universal Studios. It's about a half an hour walk (1.5 miles). About $6 ride using Lyft. There is a free shuttle but you have get the boarding pass across the street at the Holiday Inn. Will be back next year

title: Great location
review: Dear Natalya P,  Thank you for your review! We are happy to learn of the great stay during the spring break you had with us at the Comfort Suites. Thank you for complimenting our property cleanliness and professionalism of our staff. We are thrilled to hear that you will return to stay with us next year!   Sincerely, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Clean, comfortable, inexpensive
review: Just spent three nights at this hotel and had a great stay. Location is only a mile to Universal Studios and very convenient to every where else. Nice breakfast daily. Very quiet. Loved sitting outside on the benches. Nice pool. Typical rooms. Clean with friendly staff.  Would recommend.

title: Clean and Conveniently located
review: Dear 4foursisters,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review for our hotel. I appreciate your compliments of our team and on the cleanliness of our hotel. We’re happy you enjoyed our location, room, and the service we offered. We sincerely appreciate your recommending us to other travelers and look forward to seeing you again soon.  Best regards, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Great stay
review: Clean, comfortable, and inexpensive - that's what I want from a Comfort Suites, and this one delivers. Just about a mile from Universal Studios (great location for us) we had a two queen bed suite with a pull-out sofa that was fine for the 5 of us. The outdoor pool was nice enough, if nothing to write home about. But this was a fraction of the price of some other hotels nearby, and it was just what we wanted. The ONLY downside (and it's a small thing) is that they don't have their own desk for purchasing park tickets - but the hotel next door does. All in all, a great family value hotel.

title: Great experience!
review: This is a comfortable, clean hotel, with a delicious complimentary breakfast, and close proximity to Universal. The outdoor pool and hot tub were great, too. It is our second year coming here, and we will definitely come back. Great value, great hotel.

title: Great hotel, great localization
review: Dear Kate V,  Thank you so much for taking the time to post your thoughtful review about our hotel. Being your favorite hotel is an honor! We are happy that you enjoy your stays. All of us truly care about our guests so they feel home while away from home. We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to seeing you again very soon.  Sincerely, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Good hotel and location
review: I would recommend this hotel to everyone that goes to Orlando. Great hotel, very comfortable room. Large bed, very clean and good breakfast. Free parking close to the entry. 5min to Universal. I will come back for sure.

title: Great location !
review: Dear Marceladu,  Thank you for choosing our property and leaving such wonderful feedback. We know that there are many hotels to choose from while in the Orlando area and we sincerely appreciate you choosing ours and recommending us to fellow travelers! We hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: In a heart beat -
review: Stayed here overnight for concert in downtown. Hotel in good location, well kept, rooms generous size and clean. Very good internet connection and speed. Bed was not as comfortable as we like. Room offers fridge, coffee, microwave. Typical hotel breakfast. Check in, out was fast, all staff very pleasant.

title: Great value, close to the Parks
review: Great location.  It's a very short (<5 minutes), simple drive to the park with easy to understand signage.  Plenty of parking. The hotel itself was exactly what we hoped at this price point.  Hotel was clean, room was very spacious, and comfortable.  Breakfast was standard hotel buffet style options, but the variety was good, and it saved us from spending $30 on food at the parks.  Staff was friendly, and welcoming.  They had an optional free shuttle to Universal, that you signed up for at the Holiday Inn next door.  Looks like those shuttles filled up fast tho, so if you need one, book it immediately.

title: Clean quiet hotel
review: Dear SamIAm_1021,  We sincerely appreciate your informative review of our Comfort Suites. It sounds like your accommodations were clean and comfortable, and we hope you have a chance to return in the near future.   Thank you, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Not great, just average
review: This was a very clean, quiet hotel. The room was huge with 2 queen beds, a sofa bed, small table with 2 chairs and a micro/refrigerator combo. The hot breakfast was disappointing. They had fried eggs which neither looked nor tasted appetizing. They also had waffles and danishes. Not a huge selection of danishes and muffins and no fruit. It was very crowded in the mornings but there seemed to be space for everyone. My daughter had an interview at Nova Southeastern and this hotel could not have been more convenient. The Millenia mall with a bunch of restaurants and shops nearby is also less than a 5 minute drive. Very close to Universal.

title: Wonderfully Wonderful!
review: Dear txmom1,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review our property. We appreciate you sharing your experience with other travelers. We are glad to hear you liked our location, amenities and spacious room. I’m sorry that you didn’t find our breakfast variety to your liking, but we appreciate your comments and suggestions. Thank you again for your feedback and we hope to see you again on your next visit to the Orlando area.  Sincerely, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Clean,  good breakfast just a  good place to stay.
review: We stayed here while visiting Universal Orlando. The hotel is average. Not excellent, not great, just average. The rooms are VERY spacious and clean, which is a plus, but there are other aspects that detract from even the most roomy accommodations. The beds were lumpy and truly needed to be rotated and flipped. We had persistent tv problems. Despite complaints the front desk, our next door neighbors continued to let their kids scream bloody murder until midnight. (For reference, the person to respond to the complaint told us that sometimes kids are kids....yeah except you are staying in a hotel with other guests. This ain't your own house.) Also, the breakfast was a bit of a disappointment with folks consistently wiping out the fruit stocks for a later-in-the-day snack. The…

title: Temple visit
review: Comfortable and spacious rooms,  clean,  well kept.  Congratulations to the person who cleans the room.  Extraordinary job. Nice location.  The breakfast could be better.  The sofa bed,  not comfortable.  Overall,  very good.

title: Amazing Stay.
review: Thank you for sharing your wonderful comments regarding your recent stay at our hotel. I am glad you found our location convenient, and comfortable, but disappointed to read the sofa and breakfast were not to your expectations. We appreciate and value your feedback. I will make sure to share your wonderful comments with our house keeping staff. It is always a pleasure to receive positive feedback. Thank you again for sharing your experience, and we hope your next visit will be even more pleasant than the previous one.

title: Great location, enjoyable stay
review: We came to this place as a last minute booking from staying in one terrible hotel before and we got a great deal for this hotel. We got a double queen suite and it was a great room. The room was clean and spacious and the bathroom was quite large too. The breakfast was great with eggs and sausage or eggs and bacon. The variety of coffee flavors were great too. We ended up staying for 4 nights and it was 5 mins from Universal studios. I would highly recommend this hotel for anyone staying in Orlando and is going to Universal Studios.

title: Decent place to stay on a budget
review: Dear hikkiwaka,  Thank you so much for the glowing review of our hotel. I am very happy to hear that the staff did such a great job taking care of you and your family while you were here! We hope to give you the same experience next time you come to visit.  Sincerely, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Best Choice near Universal with tasty breakfast
review: We had asked for two rooms to be next to each other when booking. We were very happy the hotel accommodated us. The rooms were spacious, clean and in a great location to Universal. Lots of restaurants nearby. The breakfast area was clean and had many choices. They even had an overflow room since it gets busy in the morning. Choices included hot and cold cereals, hard boiled eggs, yogurt, fruit, pastries, bagels, bread, scrambled eggs and sausage. They also had a wafflemaker. The hotel is off the main road so not much noise and was directly across from Universal. It is a little too far to walk but only took 5 mins. to drive there. We would stay here again.

title: Trip to Universal Studios
review: Pros; 1) clean, big room; 2) nice and friendly staff; 3) good breakfast selection; free shuttle service to Universal Studios; 4) free breakfast bag to go for those leaving before breakfast time.  Cons: 1) no shuttle service to airport  I would definitely recommend this hotel to our friends

title: Good stop on our way to South FL
review: Dear 939humptydumpty,  We appreciate your review, and I'm very pleased to read that you stated many more pros than cons about our hotel. It shows that your accommodations were clean and comfortable, and we hope you have a chance to return in the near future.   Thank you, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Excellent stay, cheap price
review: Only spent one night . Decent hotel . All as expected for this category. Nice common areas but rooms starting to show their age.Very good wifi coverage.  Quite a bit of road construction in the area at the time of our visit but still quiet. No noise issue.

title: Pretty good
review: Dear pfd360,  Thank you for taking time to post your review and let other travelers know your opinion. We appreciate all the feedback that we receive. We sincerely hope that we will have another opportunity to serve your lodging needs in the future.  Best regards, Irina Marsee, General Manager.

title: Nearly wonderful!
review: Stayed overnight before heading to Disney. Nice, clean hotel with nice staff. Good breakfast in the morning before heading out. Very close to universal, and a short drive to Disney. Would definitely stay again!

title: Nice hotel reasonably priced
review: This is a very nice hotel, clean room and bath, pleasant staff and reasonably priced.  It was conveniently located to the place we wanted to visit and the breakfast was standard fare.  The only minor problem we had, was that our GPS didn’t know about Major Blvd.  It got us close but then told us we’d have to drive off-road.  We’d definitely stay here again.

title: comfort inn indead!
review: Dear FrequentTraveler696,  Thank you for leaving your feedback and letting other travelers know of your experience! We are glad to hear that you found our hotel location and amenities favorable!  We know there are many hotels to choose from when traveling to this area and we sincerely appreciate you choosing ours. Many of our guests originally stay with us because of our location, but then keep coming back because of our friendly and accommodating team members! We are glad to know that when your travel plans bring you to the area, we are the hotel that comes to mind!  Sincerely, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Perfect Budget-Friendly Distance from Universal
review: We stayed there for 2 nights. When we arrived we met DORIS the receptionist- The  SWEETEST and most helpful receptionist. She helped us with any problem we had and always with a smile! THANK YOU DORIS Other than that, the rooms were clean and comfortable. Breakfast was usual for motels and there is free shuttle to universal studio. I would like to mention that all of the staff was very kind and helpful and solved problems very quickly.

title: Nice Average Hotel
review: Dear merav122,  Thank you for your kind words about our hotel and staff! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay with us and shared your great feedback here on TripAdvisor! We hope to see you back here at Comfort Suites on your next visit to Orlando.   Sincerely, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Solid place, nothing great, nothing poor
review: The Comfort Suites was a great stay, especially for the price and the relative proximity to the Universal Parks. My wife and I were looking to spend 3 days at Universal but didn't want to pay a lot for lodging considering we'd be spending most of each day at the parks. We really just needed a place to rest our heads at night. With that goal in mind, the Comfort Suites worked perfectly.  Hospitality - the staff there was friendly and helpful, more or less exactly what I would have expected. Free breakfast was provided every morning, and it was always pretty good with a good variety of breakfast options each morning. For example, we'd have eggs one day, biscuits and gravy the next, and so on. Good variety, good food, good people.  Rooms - we had a double queen room, and the layout…

title: Visit to Universal
review: We stayed in a king bed room and were very pleased. The room was clean and the bed comfortable. The staff was excellent, which is always important to us. We would stay here again. The breakfast was adequate, nothing special but great coffee.

title: Best Value for Money
review: Dear Pat M,  Thank you for your review! I am excited to learn of the great stay you and your family had with us. I am glad you enjoyed our hotel, friendly team members, and great coffee. Thank you for choosing our hotel for your stay, and I hope you will return again during your next visit to Orlando!  Sincerely, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Forgot room picks..
review: Best breakfast I ever had at any hotel of this segment. Very close to Universal Studios and had a pleasant stay. Easy check-in and convenient breakfast timings and huge space so it didnt look crowded.

title: Good location, Good price, Nice rooms
review: Dear Vikram K.  Thank you very much for staying with us at Comfort Suites Universal Studios, and sharing your experience on TripAdvisor. I am happy to read you had a pleasant stay enjoying your breakfast and our convenient location. Your feedback is much appreciated and we are working hard to ensure your highest satisfaction. We look forward to welcoming you again!

title: Universal Visit
review: Awesome like i said before ohhh..and they are Fido approved 🐕. Free breakfast..vending machines pool n they came to check if it was alk good after check in! Suite probably as good and they have cribs for small ones.

title: Good value
review: Convenient to Universal, nice pool, front desk staff outstanding. Perfect for price point. Short drive to shopping and restaurants. Carpet was a bit worn but clean. Room was large with dining table, sofa and coffe table. Breakfast included, tea and coffee available 24 hours.

title: Great place
review: Dear Nancy N,  We appreciate your review and candid comments about your recent stay.  We are happy that you had a good stay with us. We hope that we will be your lodging choice for your next visit to the Orlando area.  Sincerely, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Excellent
review: Nice modern clean rooms.  Nice pool and hot tub.  Helpful front desk.  Good breakfast. Conveniently located to Universal Studios. I based the five stars on the reasonable cost of $80-$120 per night.  If this were a more expensive hotel I would have rated it a little lower just because there is nothing fancy about the hotel or pool area but for the price it is definitely a 5 star value.

title: Vacation-extended stay
review: Dear Bob K,  Thank you so much for taking the time to post such a positive and informative review! I’m so glad you had a great stay, it is our goal with each guest and we look forward to seeing you again soon!   Best regards, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Typical Comfort Suites
review: Stayed here for 5 nights, and would highly recommend to anyone looking for a room close to Universal Studios.  Enjoyed our stay very much.  Staff was very helpful, pool area was very clean.  Well maintained hotel.

title: Poor Customer Service/ Handling Call
review: I booked 4 nights in this hotel thinking they have great customer service and okay hotel as per the reviews. I haven't even checked in yet just called in (July 21, 2016 in the morning) to make sure my reservation was received (via booking.com) and this person who answered is not very helpful nor pleasant on the phone (she sound african-american). I just asked if my reservation was received for Aug. 1st to 5th, she said she only have Aug. 2nd to 5th I should call booking.com. She didn't even tried to check further to see if there is anything else booked under my name. She sound annoyed when I asked if she is sure about it as this is not what it shows on my confirmation email. She didn't even asked further questions for her to look into this further, I feel like she just wanted to…

title: Breakfast good, room clean
review: Thank you very much for providing your feedback, I am embarrassed and deeply concern about the lack of customer service shown to you.  This is out of character for our staff and certainly contrary to our standards. You can be sure that this will be addressed immediately. Please feel free to contact me if you have any further questions or concerns, I will be more than happy to assist you, and show you what Comfort Suite Universal Area Orlando is all about.  Sincerely,

title: Convienient
review: The people were nice, the breakfast was great. The shuttle was free, but you catch it at the hotel next door, which is fine. You have to get tickets for the shuttle and it can get sold out. We had to take a cab one day (about $10) to Universal. A Burger King, Golden Corral, Japanese Steakhouse and Orlando AleHouse are within walking distance. It is not on the main International Drive area with all the shops, you will have to take the iTrolley to get there. Get the multiple day pass for the itrolley if you plan to use it, it can get expensive for a family.

title: Nice Accomosations Near Universal Studios
review: Dear Hope S,  Thank you for leaving your very informative feedback and letting other travelers know of your experience! We are glad to hear that you found our hotel location and amenities favorable! We always love to hear positive feedback about our staff here as it really helps us reinforce our culture through guest interaction and feedback. I truly appreciate you taking the time to help keep us motivated. Hope to see you on your return trip to Orlando.  Sincerely, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Great place to visit Universal
review: Right across the street from Universal. Just over the overpass to International Drive. Cracerbarrel and T.G.I. Friday's right there. The breakfest buffet is everything you would expect. I like the rooms with the little sitting area. When we get tired at the Park, we spend the rest of the day in the pool. If you don't mind driving to Universal (it's about 3 minutes away) it is the perfect location. I have stayed there many times.

title: Unexpectedly cool!
review: I moved in the hotel as transition before we embarked to other town and found this very good hotel with very friendly and helpful staff. The room was clean and spacious enough to fit in my family size of 5. It made an excellent value of price we paid. Keep it on!

title: Excellent Staff
review: Dear 348wisnup,  Thank you so much for review! We are glad to hear you had an enjoyable stay and that we were able to surprise you with the hospitality of our staff and cleanliness of our hotel as all of us truly care about our guests so they feel home while away from home. Thank you again for sharing your experience with other travelers and we hope you will stay with us again if your traveling plans bring you to Orlando.  Sincerely, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Great Value, Friendly and Welcoming
review: You cant ask for a better location. Just minutes away from Universal and from International drive. Very friendly front office. The room was clean and neat. Had to use the bussiness center to print something out and what well organized and clean. The only negative is that Ive stayed and other Comfrort Suites, and this has the smallest breakfast area. Got crowded quickly.

title: Enjoyable stay at Comfort Inn Suites Universal
review: Dear E-man1979,  I just wanted to take this time to thank you for leaving your comments about your resent visit to the Comfort Suites Orlando. Your opinion is very important to us. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for your compliments on our staff. I'm sorry you were not able fully enjoy our complimentary breakfast during your stay due to too many people. This time a year is our busiest time and we have families and groups in house with 4-5 people per room. Breakfast hours are 7 am to 10 pm and we usually have our meeting room set up for breakfast overflow during this time to accommodate as many people as possible, but sometimes it's not enough if too many people come down at the same time. We all hope that it will not impact the possibility of your returning back to our hotel if your travel plans bring you to Orlando.   Sincerely, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Wonderful Visit
review: We had a wonderful stay here, the breakfasts were superb, the staff couldn't do enough for you - they were so helpful and informative, there was a lovely pool area which the kids loved and fantastic coffee was available on tap!  It's close to Universal and a selection of shops and restaurants - I would reccommend it to anyone!

title: Only in Orlando
review: We are in Comfort Suites hotel when we learned about the Choice club privileged stay.We stayed there for two different visits and received a 50$ reward. Our room  had to 2 double queen beds ,refrigerator, with WiFi, USB port, and air conditioning. We were lo cated near a shopping mall and we ate at Fridays, and Steak House.

title: Nice place to stay close to Universal
review: Dear kennethh95,  Thank you so much for taking the time to post your informative review! We sincerely hope that you enjoyed your stay with us and will be delighted to see you come back to our hotel on your next trip to Orlando.  Best regards, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Girls weekend
review: We checked in this hotel as a church group. Staff was very friendly and pleasant. Continental breakfast was plentiful every morning. Our suited were comfortable. The rooms had a mini fridge and microwave along with a pullout sofa bed. The pool area was small but the kids had a wonderful time. This hotel is literally right across the street from Universal Studios and 5 minutes from Orlando premium outlets, Holy Land and Millennium Mall. A short walk to several eating restaurants to include Golden Corral, Ale House, and Burger King, just to name a few. This hotel does not offer free shuttle service but you can catch the shuttle for free next door at the Holiday Inn Express. Overall we had a wonderful stay.

title: Nice Stay
review: Dear N D,  Thank you for taking the time to write your great informative review on Trip Advisor. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for your compliments on our staff. We look forward to your next visit to Orlando.   Best regards, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Great stay
review: This hotel was my favorite spot to stay when we come to Orlando but no more let me tell you what didn't go wrong we got there tried to check in they telling me my card was declined so they  tried again no luck and I know I had money but long story short it was there system not working so they put it off on me like I didn't have money and then I finally got checked in and then we goes to the room 326 what a nightmare the fridge wasn't cold the a/c didn't work and let's not forget the toilet wouldn't flush properly and this was the 1st thirty minutes in the room so I called down stairs so maintenance man Donald came he replaced the fridge and he did something to the toilet and hell we left the room for about 2 hours a/c was still not working so once again I called down stairs so…

title: Good location
review: The woman at the front desk was wonderful, very friendly and welcoming.  My room was clean and comfortable. My only complaint, as with all Comfort Suites, the lighting in the rooms is very poor.  I travel often and find that consistently at every Comfort Suites.  The hotel is near many other hotels and several restaurants making it easy to get somewhere to eat.  I would definitely stay here again.

title: good rooms but slippey bathroom floors.
review: Dear Casey W,  Thank you for leaving your great feedback and letting other travelers know of your experience! We are glad to hear that you found our hotel location and amenities favorable, our stuff members friendly, and room clean and comfortable! Also, thank you for taking the time to leave your comments and suggestion about lightening in the room. It is appreciated and valued, and we will look into this matter. We will be happy to welcome you back again soon!   Sincerely, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Vacation
review: We Liked the Hot Tub and pool. The Hotel was just located in a good spot for food and to all the Parks both Universal & Disney & downtown. I would stay here again the next time we come down. The breakfast was good.

title: Great for the pay
review: Dear 903raymondn,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on Trip Advisor. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay and liked our amenities and location. We look forward to your next visit to Orlando.   Best regards, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Great deal for a nice hotel, walking distance to Universal Studios
review: Hotel was clean and comfortable some things look little worn in room didn't use pool so can not rate that free breakfast was good lots of choices if going to Universal Studios shuttle is across the way at Holiday Inn Express must get boarding pass at Holiday Inn Express between 7:00am to 10.45am also if want go see attractions use I-Ride Trolly.

title: Clean room
review: The room was very clean and the staff was friendly. Decent complimentary breakfast each morning. The pool area was nice and clean. Convenient location for trips to Universal Studios. Overall good value.

title: One of the best....
review: Dear Jennifer J.,  We appreciate your review, and I'm very pleased to read that our team provided friendly service during your stay. It sounds like your accommodations were clean and comfortable, and we hope you have a chance to return in the near future.   Thank you, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Clean & Quiet Place to Sleep
review: This was one of the best Comfort Suites I've stayed in.  I was there for a conference for one night.  I was greeted with a smile from the desk clerk and she was very helpful with all my requests.  The room was very spacious and clean.  The hotel grounds look very nice.  There was a good hot breakfast.  I would truly recommend this hotel to anyone and would stay here again.

title: Clean, Comfortable, and Great Staff
review: Dear Desiree J,  Thank you for taking the time to write this great review on Trip Advisor. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for your compliments on our staff. We look forward to your next visit to Orlando.   Sincerely, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Just Basic
review: Booked three nights here for our 10 year anniversary (we spent our days at Universal and just needed a room to crash). I found the best deal thru a 3rd party website - I called the hotel to see if they would match the rate on the website so they could generate the revenue direct (rather than having to pay a commission to the 3rd party) however they didn't do that. I prefer to book directly with the hotel so if any issues I can deal with them direct rather than the 3rd party. I couldn't pass up the rate so I booked my reservation online. I contacted the hotel the next day to confirm they received the 3rd party booking and all was well. I spoke to the reservations line and asked if I could just put a note on the reservation that it was our 10 year anniversary and we just wanted to…

title: Short trip to Disney
review: We stayed for two nights on a quick trip to Disney. We were pleasantly surprised by the hotel room. It was very spacious, modern, and clean. The bed was very comfortable. The first floor was quiet. The breakfast buffet was very good, lots of choices for our family of four. Located right across the street from Universal in a nice quiet area and 15 minutes to the Magic Kingdom. Will definitely stay here again.

title: Great experience, great location
review: Dear Dania Tally,  We were delighted to hear that you had an exceptional stay with us during your recent trip and we will be happy to serve your lodging needs when you return visiting the Orlando area.  Sincerely, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Great Location, Good hotel
review: A warm welcome by Sandy, getting a superior room, 320, was a joy. My room was a full suite, very clean with a plus of 2 TV's and in the evening a view of Universal fireworks! Comfy bed, super breakfast with waffles you make and a location close to I drive for numerous restaurants, makes this a winner!

title: fun trip to orlando
review: Dear lathamgal,  Thank you for leaving the wonderful comments and letting other travelers know of your experience! We are glad to know that when your travel plans bring you to the area, we are the hotel that you will chose! Again, thank you for your feedback, it is appreciated and valued. We look forwarded to welcoming you back again soon!  Best regards, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Cockroach
review: I was one of the few who was here on business, not to visit Universal.  The is a good Comfort Suites.  Good breakfast, lots of choices and well stocked even with a big crowd.  The hotel is a little worn but comfortable.  The bed was clean and comfortable.  The AC wasn't working well when I checked in and I asked the front desk to have it checked in when I left in the morning but I don't think they did.  When I returned, I called the desk and maintenance was there promptly and fixed the issue.  The interactions with the staff was pleasant and efficient otherwise.  Not much of an exercise room.  A solid stay in a trusted name hotel.

title: Awesome stay
review: This hotel was great. Rooms are very nice. Beds comfortable and breakfast was delicious. The staff was friendly and called to make sure the room was to my satisfaction! Never had that happen an hour after checking in. Will make plans to stay here again this summer. Close to Universal Studios of course, restaurants and not far from shopping.

title: Spring Break Family Vacation
review: Dear Kathy S.,  Thank you for leaving the wonderful comments and letting other travelers know of your experience! We are glad to know that when your travel plans bring you to the area, we are the hotel that you will chose! We look forwarded to welcoming you back again soon!  Best regards, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Great hotel for the price
review: The hotel was clean with plenty of space for family of four in room, good selection for breakfast. About 15 minute walk to Universal. Good customer service. We would stay at this Comfort Suites again.

title: Okay, for short visits
review: Dear Richard W.,  Thank you very much for the brief review of our property and sharing you experience with other travelers. I'm glad that you enjoyed the comfort of your room and complimentary hot breakfast we provide for all of our guests.  The staff will certainly appreciate your comments about their service. We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to seeing you again very soon.  Sincerely, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Good location to universal studios
review: We booked 2 rooms for 3 nights for my husband and I and our daughter and her family.The rooms are large with a small sitting area where there is a sofa bed and coffee table .There is also a small dinette set and refrigerator and microwave in each room. The location is great to Universal Studios. It rained the first day there in the afternoon and we were able to go back to the hotel easily and then go back in the evening after the rain stopped. Our son in law walked back to the hotel(15-20minutes)and drove back to pick up the rest of us. There is a drop off and pickup places at the entrance of Universal. The hotel was very clean,the staff helpful,the breakfast had many choices.We also went to Disney World from there.Very easy and only about 20 minutes away.Would definitely stay…

title: Short stay with our family.
review: We booked this room for a short 2 night stay with our daughters. We always get condo's now that our daughters are older. However we were not able to fine one for the short 2 night stay in the area. Just needed a place to sleep, after spending a day at the park.   The room size was great for the 5 of us plus an infant. Our daughters are 20, 16, and 11 with a 6 month old granddaughter. We had enough room for the girls to sleep and set up a pack n play for the baby.  We were even rained out one day and spent extra time in the room napping. We all were in close quarters, however it wasn't horrible, Just gave us some close family time. The rooms were clean, and up to date. Even made some use out of the pool and hot-tub.

title: Nice hotel, great price
review: Dear Melissa S.,  Thank you so much for taking the time to post your thoughtful review about our hotel. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us and spent some quality family time while here. We hope you’ll come back again when your travels bring you to the Orlando area!  Sincerely, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Very Impressed
review: We enjoyed our stay at this Comfort Suite. It offers everything you need for a hotel with fridge and microwave. Very clean and well managed. Good price. Great location and so close to highway 4 and Disney.... Next time to Orlando, we will stay here for sure!

title: Stay close to Universal
review: Thank you for taking the time to review our property. I am glad you enjoyed your stay and found our property well managed and conveniently located.  Once again thank you very much for sharing your experience, and we look forward to your next visit.

title: Nice hotel, comfortable
review: Pleasantly surprised to find sanitizing wipes, one each for the TV remote and phone. Gym was clean and organized. Breakfast area was also very clean and well stocked. Friendly and helpful housekeeping personnel.

title: Comfortable and Clean but a Little Noisy
review: I picked this hotel for a three night stay for a short break away from home. My time was spent reading, walking and exercising; I didn't visit the nearby theme park. I found the staff polite and professional. My room was clean, spacious and comfortable and my fiancee and I received a free upgrade to a king size room which was a delightful surprise. Unfortunately I found the room received a lot of outside noise, in particular during the morning where I found myself woken at around 7am and unable to return to sleep.
