The included breakfast was good, with cereal, baked goods, juices, tea & coffee, waffle maker and some cooked food available. The breakfast area was bustling each morning as people enjoyed the offerings.  I found the fitness area to be effective. There are two cross…

title: Quite
review: Dear pithy_quote,  Thank you for leaving your very informative feedback and letting other travelers know of your experience! We know there are many hotels to choose from when traveling to this area and we sincerely appreciate you choosing ours. Many of our guests originally stay with us because of our location, but then keep coming back because of our friendly and accommodating team members! We hope that when your travel plans bring you to the area, we are the hotel that comes to mind!  Sincerely, Irina Matrsee, General Manager

title: Spotless!!
review: The service was very nice. Room was clean and big. Just in front of the hotel is located an amusement park.  A supermarket is very near and a minigolf camp is too. Breakfast is incluided, is not great, mainly the same every day, but is ok if you want to save money.

title: Retirement Enjoyment
review: It sound you enjoyed your visit to our hotel and were able to enjoy all the fun stuff nearby. I am sorry our breakfast selection was not to your satisfaction, and I hope this will not deter you from visit us again.  Once again thank you for sharing, and will hope to see again soon!!

title: Clean and Comfortable
review: Winding up our Universal Studios Annual Pass; we decided to stay off premise this time.  Comfort Suites was a great choice!!  Impressed from the get go with the spotless room.  There were sanitizing wipes by the phone and TV to wipe germs off anything items in the room; which I haven't seen before any place we've stay and not sure if I have Lisa Rinna to thank LOL!!  But I hope this becomes a trend.  Our room was nice, large; micro and nice size fridge.  They have a nice business center; great work out room and beautiful pool area that we were able to really enjoy.  Our check in was smooth; friendly and with smiles by Teresa.  Given a senior discount as well.  Their free breakfast was great; lots to chose from and another room was opened for over-flowing guests.  One of the best…

title: 2 day stay.
review: Arrived early asked if they happened to have a spot for us. Jaqueline found a room. After getting settled in got a call from Jaqueline to see if everything was ok. Nice little touches everywhere. Nancy the breakfast attendant worked her butt off both breakfasts. Overall great stat.

title: Great stay!
review: Dear Rin H  Thank you for your great review regarding your recent stay with us. I will make sure to share your wonderful comments with our breakfast attendant Nancy and Front Desk Agent Jacqueline.  Once again thank you for your patronage, and hope to see you soon!

title: Quiet and Conveniently Located
review: Pleasantly surprised! This felt like a luxury hotel with the price tag of a Super 8! The hotel is in great condition and the rooms are very comfortable. The breakfast area was nice and not too crowded. The staff were also great!  The only 2 cons: -A few tiny bugs on the night stand -Shower head a little rusty and coming loose  Will stay here again!!

title: Quiet, Clean, Friendly Hotel Close to Universal
review: Dear Roarviews,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on Trip Advisor. We are delighted that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for your compliments on our staff! We are glad to know that when your travel plans bring you to the area, we are the hotel that you will chose!  We look forward to your next visit to Orlando.   Best regards, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Crooks
review: We paid ahead and got a really nice sized room.  We were on the first floor and it was quiet.  The bathroom was clean and adequately furnished.  I did not see a safe though.  I like this area because it is really close to Universal Studios but not its main entrance.  The immediate area has some restaurants like TGIFridays, Subway, McDonald's and a cute arepa restaurant. I believe there is also a Publix nearby if you wanted to save alittle on meals.  This hotel also sells out quickly because of the price and quality.  We stayed at the Hampton Inn nearby and were not nearly as satisfied.  Breakfast was adequate and the area was clean. They have Dramamine in their little sundry shop if you need that before you get to the park.  It is half the price.

title: One of our best check in experiences ever
review: We wanted two nights R and R after a long flight from England and an overnight stop at an airport motel.  After reading reviews, I am with Bill Bryson on this, I heard him say on TV that he never takes a review on Tripadvisor seriously when the reviewer has bad grammar/spelling, therefore, most of the bad reviews were ignored. Thank goodness. Telephoned ahead to say I use a wheelchair but can walk for two to three minutes so need a room easily accessible without being a disabled room as I always feel someone worse than me could use it.  Am in constant pain but life must go on.  On arrival, the Gentleman on reception immediately checked us in even though we were a few hours ahead of check in time.  We were within my walking distance of the pool area and the breakfast so we left…

title: Highly Recommend
review: Dear Velma44,  Thank you so much for taking the time to post this great review! I'll be sure to share your great comments with all the team members. I’m sure they’ll be excited to hear the feedback. They work very hard to make sure to create a great positive experience for all of our guests and feedback such as yours is what makes our job rewarding. We hope you’ll come back again when your travels bring you to the Orlando area!  Sincerely, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Good Value
review: Hotel staff were friendly and extremely helpful. The room was clean, the bed and pillows comfy and the entire hotel and amenities were clean. Breakfast was good with a great choice. The spa, pool and gym were clean although not a lot of equipment in the gym. The shuttle to Universal from the Holiday Inn next door was great and the location great to walk to a few restaurants and convenience store. We stayed here 11 nights and would stay again.

title: Good value
review: Dear Carole K.,  Thank you for choosing our property and leaving such wonderful feedback. We know that there are many hotels to choose from while in the Orlando area and we sincerely appreciate you choosing ours! We hope to welcome you back soon!  Sincerely, Irin Marsee, General Manager

title: Nice one nighter.
review: Room was clean and service was good! Great value for the Orlando area. We only stayed here one night before Disney check-in. Staff was prompt, gave good recommendations for food in area, and breakfast was above average.

title: Christmas vac.
review: Everything was clean and fresh.  Front desk workers were very helpful telling me of the free shuttle to Universal.  The free morning breakfast was hot and good.  Only one set back was that the air condition did not pump out the really cold air but it was cool...

title: Decent but staff is rude
review: Dear J2346QWjamesf,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review our property. We appreciate you sharing your experience with other travelers. We are glad to hear you liked our amenities and staff. We hope to see you back here at Comfort Suites on your next visit to Orlando.   Sincerely, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: It was ok
review: Staff is not welcoming, felt like they hate it, they need to give a welcoming smile to guests. Breakfast was good and rooms were good. Bed was comfortable and the bathroom was good. Good location for universal , had shuttle from next hotel but shuttle sucks

title: All good except air conditioning was a problem.
review: Dear Sibish B.,  Thank you for your comments about our hotel. Your opinion is very important to us. I'm glad that you found location and amenities of our hotel to your liking. I am very sorry for the fact that our staff members fail to provide you with the superior service. I sincerely apologize for falling short of your expectations as this is not typical of the high standards we strive to maintain. I would greatly appreciate if you contact me as I would like to speak with you personally and find out more about the issue. Please be assured that I am sharing your concerns with all appropriate management so that corrective measures are taken where feasible.  We hope that you will allow us another opportunity to serve you better in the future.  Sincerely, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Pretty nice hotel
review: I booked this hotel as it received good reviews.  The location for Universal was wonderful as it was right down the road.  The shuttle to Universal does not come to this hotel, but to a neighboring hotel.    The hotel itself was ok. The staff was courteous but not overly friendly.  The room size was standard, but it was not clean.  Clean is my biggest requirement for a hotel, and this one did not hit the mark.  The bathroom was not clean at all, and that's a big issue for me personally. There was hair on the floor, in the shower, on the counter, and on the towels.   The bathroom itself was in need of serious repair.  I can look past the failing patchwork on the ceiling, peeling wallpaper, etc, but the hair and being dirty, I cannot.  We arrived after a very long day of…

title: Huge rooms, good breakfast, good location
review: We got a great deal on this room via hotels.com and received two really spacious double queen rooms. Although there were only 2 of us in 1 room and 1 in another, the rooms would easily sleep 5. The guy on  reception was really friendly and called us a taxi to City Walk. It's easily walk-able, but it was dark and we weren't sure where we were going! It only cost us around $7 anyway. The breakfast was decent and the free parking and wifi were much appreciated. Perhaps a little too far away from Disney, but great for Universal.

title: Great place - keeps me coming back!!
review: Dear Emily E.,  Thank you for your great feedback in regards to the Comfort Suites stay. I am excited to read your positive comments and have shared it with the hotel's team members. We hope to see you again on your next visit to the Orlando area.   Sincerely,  Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Universal Studios
review: Always a nice place to stay.  Very clean - both the rooms and the property.  Never had any issues here - that's what keeps me coming back to this location!!  Far away from I-4, that it's not noisy - but yet access to I-4 is only 2 miles away.  Great selection of restaurants near by. The breakfast area could be a little larger, but it is laid out well.

title: Surprisingly Impressed!!!!!
review: Thank you so much for your kind words, we are glad you had a great stay.  I am pleased to hear you are a return guest and can’t wait until you come back to see us.

title: Good place to rest your head
review: We picked this hotel because we could walk to universal (they also had a shuttle). We were a bit sceptic all because they were actually a lot cheaper than other hotels in area. We were very pleased. The staff was friendly.  The rooms were clean, quiet and comfortable.   We Would definitely stay here again

title: Beware of thieves!
review: Stayed at this hotel from October 10 to 15 and had a $680 cell phone stolen from the pool area, so BEWARE!!!  Do not take anything valuable with you to this hotel's area!    We immediately made a complaint to the front desk, and also an official report to the police.  Were advised that since there were cameras at the front desk, and also at the pool area, that more than likely the culprit was captured on camera and the cameras will be reviewed.  This happened on our second day of stay, so went to the desk every day thereafter inquiring about what was captured on camera.  Finally on the second last day of our stay we were told that the cameras had been reviewed but were too grainy and dark to pick out anybody in particular!!  We were also told that the thief didn't enter through…

title: Hotel stay
review: Dear carrie-7,  I want to express my apology for the frustration and inconvenience this incident caused. Please let me assure you that what happened in your case is not typical of our level of customer service. I am sorry that your emails were unanswered, but I, GM of this property, did not receive  any communication from you or Choice Customer relations department. I will contact you personally at the phone number we have on file.  We take very seriously the incidents like this one. Police report was filed and we will fully comply with all their requirements to complete an investigation. Also, thank you for informing us that our insurance specialist is not getting back to you.  I will make certain that they get in touch with you ASAP. In a meantime, I would like to let you know that nothing is more important for us than to regain your trust   Again, please accept my sincerest apologies.  Feel free to contact me with any questions or concerns you might have.    Sincerely,  Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: VERY pleased with the value and hotel!
review: We stayed for 4 nights at this hotel . It is set in a quiet location away from the main roads . The bedrooms are very clean with comfortable beds , have tea , coffee , fridge and a microwave . A free safe is available at the reception desk and we found the staff very helpful . They told us not to order anything from the menus pushed under our bedroom doors . Breakfast is free , it does get busy and you may have to wait for a table but lots of choice , scrambled egg , bagels .yogurts , fruit , cereal , waffles etc . The pool is next to the car park and the towels are small but ok and the pool is heated  A free bus runs to and from Universal studios where you can eat at City walk if you don't want to walk about . If walking you leave the hotel and turn left and then right ,  walk…

title: Satisfied Guest
review: Thank you for leaving your informative feedback and letting other travelers know of your experience.  We are happy to hear you had a great stay.  I’m happy that you got to use the pool and the Universal shuttle.  It’s always nice to hear good feedback the staff works very hard.  We hope to serve you again on your next trip to Orlando.

title: Close to universal, and thats about it.  Beware they allow you to be scammed.
review: Our son-in-law and daughter joined my wife and me for an overnight stay at this hotel, while we visited Universal's "Halloween Horror Night" in Orlando. If you want to save the $20 parking fees at Universal and don't mind the walk, it's about a 25-minute walk from the hotel to Universal's City Walk. <ahem!> Now to the hotel... our beds and room were CLEAN, well-appointed, and comfortable, with LOADS of recharging sockets (including two USB ports for recharging) in the room. Sealed plastic cups for drinking (news about glass drinking glass cleaning practices are discomfiting). There is a "Continental Breakfast" offered from 7-10AM, including copious amounts of coffee, "eggs" and sausage patties, plus the usual Belgian waffles, pastries, fruit, and cereal. The staff was warm,…

title: Comfy!
review: I Would stay here again! The hotel was clean, comfortable, and had good breakfast included. The staff was always friendly and helpful. Close to Universal Studios. If taking taxi cost was only $10 with tip! I would absolutely stay here again!

title: Convenient Location
review: Thank you for your nice comments about your stay at the Comfort Suites Universal Studios Area.  We are happy that you got a good night’s sleep and enjoyed our breakfast.  I’m pleased that our staff was able to take care of all your needs.  We can’t wait to serve you again on your next visit to Orlando.

title: Nice Overnight Stay
review: i enjoyed stay at this location. Local I-Ride Trolley couple if minutes away to hop on and off unlimited times for just $5 a day to go down International Avenue and other shopping areas.  Hotel clean with exercise room facilities and free breakfast.   Felt comfortable at location and front desk is helpful if you need s car to drop you off somewhere.  Visited Holy Land Experience....cat there within 10 minutes.  Would definitely stay a day longer just to relax in hotel.

title: Great location, super rooms and service
review: Thank you for your nice comments about our hotel.  I'm glad you got to take advantage of our amenities and some of our local attractions.  It’s great to hear feedback about how good our staff is doing.  Hopefully next time you will be able to stay longer and have a day to relax.  We look forward to seeing you again on your next trip to Orlando.

title: Excellent choice
review: Convenient location to Universal. Lobby breakfast area appealing and inviting. Front desk staff was accommodating with request for room facing parking lot. Reserved a room with two beds, they were doubles, not the queens we are used to with the chain. Room was clean and cleaning staff lady was very pleasant and checked to see if there was anything we needed. While in room 412 noticed a gray area of the ceiling with possible past mold/leak treatment? Bathroom and vanity separated which is always a plus with adequate leg room between bathroom door and commode and no fighting the door to get into the shower, yay! Did notice that the door hinges was rusted and some worn through rusted areas at bottom of door frame. Nothing really overly unsightly but just noticeable when "sitting"…

title: great stay
review: my husband and I enjoyed our stay. The rooms are very clean and comfortable. In walking distance from restaurants and entertainment.  The pool was great and also clean.  close to parks and entertainment.  We would recommend this hotel.   our flight was delayed several hours causing us to arrive at the hotel at 6am.  we called to let the hotel know. They printed and had our paperwork ready so we had a very speedy check in.

title: A Suite of a Hotel
review: Dear DanielleScorz,  Thank you for leaving the wonderful feedback  about your visit to Comfort Suites Universal Studios Area! We always love to hear feedback about how friendly and accommodating the staff is here as it really helps us reinforce our culture through guest interaction and feedback. I truly appreciate you taking the time to help keep us motivated. Hope to see you on your return trip to Orlando.  Sincerely, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Good home base for Universal Studios
review: We had a Suite on the fourth floor. It had a Refrigerator, Microwave and two Televisions. The Suite had  beautiful furnishings. They offer a nice Breakfast every morning. There are a lot of Restaurants in the area. This Hotel is very close to the Universal Studios entrance. The staff is Very Friendly.  The Hotel is close to Interstate 4, however it is far enough away that You will Not hear any Traffic noise. You cannot go wrong staying here. The grounds are nicely landscaped and it is a Beautiful Hotel to come to at the end of Your day.

title: Cheap, well located, short stay
review: Dear RC62170,  Thank you for leaving the wonderful comments and letting other travelers know of your experience!  We are very happy that you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to give you the same experience next time you come to visit.   Sincerely, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Great value and close enough to universal
review: Service here is excellent, and all the rest is just what you'd come to expect from a Comfort Suites - comfortable beds, working showers, free wifi and free breakfast. I chose this hotel because it had a shuttle to Universal Studios, but it turns out that the shuttle actually picks up at a neighboring hotel. No big deal, except you have to show up early in the morning to try and get tickets, then also need to get return trip tickets. Since this hotel is at the end of the line, we were out of luck for one day. Seemed like a lot of hoops to jump through for a free shuttle. The park is within a walkable distance, just plan to be hot and sweaty by the time you get to the park. And at the end of a long day at the park --- let's just say my kids were less than thrilled for the walk…

title: Great visit, dispite the rain
review: Very comfortable room plenty of room for family of 4, breakfast good, different waffle flavor each morning including traditional, rest of breakfast was ok eggs were dry, powdered, sausage was good as well as bacon. It does get crowded on weekends. Didnt get to use pool cause of rain each night, but it is small.  Over all very nice hotel will stay at again when visiting Universal Studios.

title: Comfortable and clean-good for the mibey
review: Dear bhendrick43,  Thank you for leaving your comments about your recent visit to our property and letting other travelers know of your experience! We are glad to know that when your travel plans bring you to the area, we are the hotel that you will chose! Hopefully next time you stay with us it will be sunny weather and you will be able to enjoy the outdoor swimming pool and spa. We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to seeing you again very soon.  Sincerely, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Not a good Experience
review: Stayed one night on August 30 2015. Was upgraded for free to King suite.  Was clean and comfortable. Offered bus shuttle to Universal and nearby places. Courteous staff who were pleasant and helpful. Room was well equipped with necessities. Good choice for free breakfast.

title: Nice property, close to attractions and highways
review: Dear teacher41,  Thank you very much for taking the time to review our property. We appreciate you sharing your experience with other travelers. We are glad to hear you had an enjoyable stay and liked our amenities and staff. Thank you again for choosing our hotel for you visit to Orlando and we hope to be able to welcome you back in the future!  Sincerely,   Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Clean, friendly and helpful
review: Not a good experience, mold, door broken, hairdryer smelled like fire, shuttle service not good, I would not recommend this hotel to go to the Universal or Island of adventure theme parks.  The shuttle service could be improved by making it all day not ending at 1130

title: Number 1 Choice when going to Universal Studios!!!
review: Our family have stayed at this location many times while visiting Universal Studios.  Our room had 2 Queen beds, sofa sleeper, microwave, refrigerator, desk & chair, ironing board, & flat screen T.V. Beds were super comfortable, shower pressure was good, and plenty of hot water. Breakfast is the best I have had for a free breakfast!! Breakfast is totally worth the few extra dollars a night, especially compared to a few of hotels next door to the Comfort Inn. Breakfast has waffles, cereal, oatmeal, sausage, eggs, yogurt, bagels, bread, apples, oranges, coffee, apple juice, orange juice, doughnuts, or muffins. Hotel is clean and staff is helpful, and friendly. There is a security guard in the evening and doors are locked, so only hotel guests are coming in and out at those times.…

title: Great stay! No problems whatsoever
review: Dear sassy46176,  Thank you so much for taking the time to post your thoughtful review about our hotel. Being your favorite hotel is an honor. We are happy that you enjoy your stays while on vacation in Orlando, The staff will certainly appreciate your comments about their friendliness, all of us truly care about our guests so they feel home while away from home. We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to seeing you again very soon.  Best regards,  Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: wonderful
review: My mom and I visited stayed for one night from St. Augustine, FL to explore the nightlife. The hotel had close proximity to CityWalk, the room was VERY clean, and the beds were comfortable. One of the nicest hotels I have stayed in while visiting Orlando and surprisingly inexpensive. I would highly recommend.

title: Pleasant stay, close to Universal
review: Dear Sam C.,  Thank you for your kind words about our hotel and staff! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay with us and shared your great feedback here on TripAdvisor! We hope to see you back here at Comfort Suites on your next visit to Orlando.   Best regards,  Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: great hotel for great value
review: I went there 4th of July week and it was wonderful. The beds were very comfy and it is very close to universal studios. The breakfast was awesome. If u are not trying to spend alot for a hotel and want comfort and the hotel staff are friendly, then I highly recommend u check this hotel out

title: Hidden Gem!
review: Best sleep we have ever had at a hotel. Clean rooms. Awesome breakfast. The staff had wonderful customer service skills. Golden Corral buffet in walking distance as well as drugstore and other shops. Best hotel experience ever!

title: Great value!!
review: Dear Deanne P.,  Thank you so much for taking the time to post this great review! I'll be sure to share your great comments with all the team members. I’m sure they’ll be excited to hear the feedback. They work very hard to make sure to create a great positive experience for all of our guests and feedback such as yours is what makes our job rewarding. We hope you’ll come back again when your travels bring you to the Orlando area!  Sincerely,  Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Clean, quiet and close to more than I thought!
review: My room is huge! I am currently at the hotel, the room has so much room, two beds, a pull out sofa, comfy chairs, a dining table, desk and a huge bathroom with separate tub and shower. Everything is clean, the breakfast options were great for a free breakfast. Didn't have a chance to see the pool. Super friendly staff too!

title: It's Okay.
review: Dear uwpsarah.,  Thank you for leaving the wonderful comments and letting other travelers know of your experience! We are delighted that you enjoying your stay with us. Hope that you find your way back to our hotel on your next trip to Orlando in the near future.  Best regards,  Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Family vacation
review: This hotel was clean, the staff was friendly, the hot breakfast was good and the gal that worked stocking it kept the food full, fresh and hot.  The hotel is within close proximity to Universal Studios (we actually walked to the park and it was quite pleasant), it's also a short drive to International Drive, the Airport, and IKEA at the Millennia Mall.  The pool and hot tub are small, but warm, clean and inviting.  We had a suite and it was very comfortable and roomy.

title: Girls weekend
review: The rooms are clean and very spacious the staff was very nice and the housekeeping staff was on point the kept my room clean and kept me with linen and the breakfast was on point everything was fresh  they have a large selection of cooked items not just cold breakfast like cereals so this is my spot when I come to Orlando and did I mention it's in walking distance to universal studios and to others stores as well

title: Some pros and cons, horrible shower
review: Dear Shaunda B.,  We were delighted to hear that you had a wonderful stay with us. It was nice to hear that our staff provided you with an great service. They work very hard to make every guest feel special. Thank you so much for staying with us and  see you in the near future.  Sincerely, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Good choice
review: My friend's husband is a Choice Diamond member, and he booked us this hotel for 3 nights using his plethora of points for a quick girl's trip to Disney and Universal.  Can't complain there, right?  We were given complimentary bottled water and pretzels upon check-in.  The room upon first glance seemed nice and spacious.   Cleanliness was good overall.  My friend's sheets were laundered but had some obvious stains on them, which isn't a great thing you want to look at.  My mattress was kind of weirdly sunken in and not very squishy.  The A/C emitted a terrible, noxious odor, almost sewage like.  Every time it kicked in, often loudly and during the middle of the night, the smell of farts would waft our way.  On night 2, after a very long day at the park, we came back looking…

title: Bad start, okay finish.
review: Dear randompersun,  Thank you so much for taking the time to post such an informative and detailed review sharing your experience with other travelers. I am very sorry that it was an issue with the shower water pressure you experienced during your stay with us. Please accept my sincere apologies. Our team strives to give all of our guests a highest level of hotel experience during their stay by exceeding their expectations. I wish you brought it to our attention during your stay, we would be happy to change your room to make your stay comfortable and enjoyable. We greatly appreciate you feedback on this matter. It is through this feedback that we are able to improve our operation and ensure that steps are taken to alleviate such issues in the future to better serve our guests. I trust you will find future visits to the Comfort Suites Universal Studios Area much more accommodating. I thank you again for your feedback and if I can be of further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact me directly.  Sincerely, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Great choice!
review: My family and I stayed here for 2 nights.  Everything was excellent.  Staff was friendly and asked to let them know if we needed anything. Breakfast was good.  It was kept full and clean.  If I head back to Orlando I would definitely look into staying here again!

title: Better than the Double Tree for the price
review: I booked three queen suites for staff for a conference that was being held at the Double Tree because the Double Tree was sold out.  I am glad we ended up here!  I am a loyal Choice Privilege member and am generally extremely pleased with the accommodations.  This trip was no exception.  We enjoyed exceptionally clean suites with breakfast included for the same price as a regular room at the conference site, and that would have been at the block rate.  Other than that the Double Tree would have been double or triple the price.  There is even a small fitness center and a one mile block with sidewalks to get in a run each morning. Hotel staff were friendly and helpful, as always.  Rooms were comfortable and clean.  Choice hotel venues very rarely fail to please me.  Thanks for…

title: perfect site for a post-Universal crash
review: Dear Principal1,  Thank you so much for the glowing review of our hotel I am very happy to hear that the staff did such a great job taking care of you and your colleagues while you were in Orlando on business! Also, thank you for being a loyal Choice customer! We appreciate and value your business. We hope to give you the same experience next time you come to visit.  Sincerely, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Great location!
review: Within half a mile of all things Universal Studios, this no frills but perfectly comfortable hotel is an ideal home base when your days and/or late nights involve that theme park or its related properties such as the Hard Rock Hotel.    Post-midnight check-in isn't a problem. As a courtesy, and to be sure I wouldn't lose my reservation, I called in the afternoon to inform staff that I'd be a super-late arrival.   You'll find the building practically deserted by mid-morning, as the vast majority of guests hightails it to the thrill rides and is gone all day, so the hotel remains quiet.  Breakfast (including tasty fresh scrambled eggs and sausage links) is available off the lobby until 10:00 am and is included in the room rate.  Marlene at the front desk was friendly both times I…

title: Great hotel
review: Dear No_Sleep_Till_Krakow,  Thank you so much for the glowing review of our hotel! We are so happy that your experience was enjoyable, comfortable, and memorable. I am pleased that our team in whole and Marlene in particular provided you with personalized service as we aim to make our guests feel cared for and valued. At Comfort Suites Universal Studios Area, you can count on us to give you a great hotel experience - at a price that's affordable - with all the amenities you deserve. We look forward to your return in the near future.   Best regards, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Saved a ton
review: We had 2 older teenagers and walked to universal two days.  It was very doable because the location was great.  Unless you are on the property,  it was a little over a mile one way.   The breakfast was typical for most hotels.  They did have plenty of eating space.  It was quite and had gas station , a variety of eating places , and drug store/grocery  close.  The staff were knowledgeable and quite helpful.   Booked this through Expedia as package deal.   Well worth it!

title: Disappointed
review: We recently stayed here for three nights. I was looking forward to our stay based on the good reviews. When we got to our room I was very disappointed. The bathroom needed some updating or a real good cleaning. In several spots on the wallpaper there looked like there were spots of mildew. There was dirt/dust in corners or perhaps the floor needed to be scrubbed. The toilet seat was worn with chips and every time you sat the seat moved. It is very cheap to replace a seat. The paint on the wood around the mirror was all peeled off which gave a bad first impression, again an easy fix with some paint. There were stains on the rug. Our view was the roof and backside of another hotel no more than 30-40 feet away. The air conditioner was loud and would turn on and off every 10…

title: Great hotel close to Universal!
review: Dear Gershep.,  I just wanted to take this time to personally thank you for the feedback about your recent visit to the Comfort Suites Orlando Universal Studios Area. Your opinion is very important to us. I am very sorry that you had this unpleasant experience with your room cleanliness and condition. Please accept my sincere apologies. Although it's so disappointing to hear that your experience was not consistent with the excellent accommodations and services we all committed to provide to our guests, we do need to be aware of these situations. We strive to exceed all expectations and based upon your review, we certainly dropped the ball. Please let me assure you that what happened in your case is not typical of our level of cleanliness and customer service. I truly believe that some unfortunate oversight happened. I will be sharing your comments with hotel staff during our upcoming meetings as a learning tool to help us improve our performance and provide exceptional service to our guests.   I would like to let you know that nothing is more important for us than to regain your trust and all of us here hope you will give us the opportunity to welcome you to our hotel again soon and provide you with the positive Comfort Suites experience you have come to expect from us.   Sincerely,  Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Good Choice
review: Stayed here with before a day trip to Universal, loved how close and convenient it was as well as the fact it wasn't in one of the busier areas of Orlando/International Dr. Breakfast selection was good and hotel was quiet. One downside was the a/c wouldn't run on high or get cold enough but otherwise a pleasant stay.

title: Comfort found at Comfort Suites at Universal Studios
review: Dear Amber C.,  Thank you for your kind words about our hotel. We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay with us and shared your great feedback here on TripAdvisor! We hope to see you back here at Comfort Suites on your next visit to Orlando.   Best regards,  Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Very nice hotel !!!
review: Room was comfortable and clean and did include a small refrigerator and microwave. Convenient location to Universal theme park. Breakfast quality was good and well attended to by the staff. Would recommend for budget conscious travelers.

title: Work or Play, This hotel is for you....
review: Have stayed here for work and play. Staff is always very friendly and a joy to talk to. Rooms are always clean when we arrive. "I don't use maid service. Friends tell me they do a good job." Rooms are set up nice. An outlet is always close. Internet is pretty good. Prints download good. I always bring alcohol to clean things. "Y'all know what I mean" Its always nice to know this hotel thinks about my comfort more than most. That is why they leave 2 alcohol wipes for guest to clean the remote and anything else they wish. Always a pleaser when we stay here...

title: everything we were looking for
review: Dear James G.,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property and let other travelers know of your experience! We know there are many hotels to choose from when traveling to this area and we sincerely appreciate you choosing ours! We look forwarded to welcoming you back again soon!   Best Regards,  Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: 16th birthday celebration of granddaughter
review: Comfort Suites was perfect location, perfect price.  So close to universal , the shuttle was great. the rooms were good, always had plenty of towels and the breakfast was good for continental.  We even used the pool before we left. very clean and quiet

title: Just a little relaxing getaway
review: Dear Nykia D.,  Thank you so much for taking the time to post such a positive and informative review! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope you’ll come back again when your travels bring you to the Orlando area!  Sincerely,  Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: GREAT LOCATION AND STELLAR SERVICE
review: Great hotel. Perfect location for Universal Studios. The staff was great, called you by name when they saw you. We had two adjoining rooms, with two queen beds in each,super pillows on the bed, and plush sleep mattresses.  sitting area, sofa that would also make into a bed if needed. Small fridge, coffee maker, desk for computer hook up, free internet, great morning breakfast. We would definitely stay here anytime we come to Orlando. Top on our lists. .

title: Nice Spot
review: We stayed here for 2 nights so we could go to Univesal Studios. When I mentioned we were on our honeymoon they gave us a free upgrade to a king suite, which was so lovely of them. The room was fairly modern, clean and large. The bed was very comfortable and the housekeeping was good. The free breakfast was yum, had waffles, cereal, bagels, muffins, yogurt ect, and juice and coffee. It was also handy they had a little market to buy snacks etc. customer service was very helpful as well.  They have a free shuttle that takes you to Unversal CityWalk but the first time we rode it took 40mims and the driver drove like a crazy person so we just caught taxis from then on. It only cost approx $10 each way inc tip.  I would stay here again, nice spot. Free wifi was great

title: Excellent Place to Stay for Universal!
review: Dear sairsiebee.  I just wanted to take this time to personally thank you for filling out the survey for your recent visit to the Comfort Suites Universal Studios Area. We are very happy that you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to give you the same experience next time you come to visit. Your opinion is very important to us. Again, thank you for your valuable time and we look forward to having another opportunity to be your choice of hotel on your next visit to Orlando.  Sincerely,  Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Very convenient location
review: Our family of four stayed here during a trip to Universal Studios. The suite was very nice with a fold out couch and fridge and microwave. Our room was extremely clean, and the breakfast was good as well. The kids loved the waffles, and the bacon and eggs on the second day. The breakfast area was also plenty big enough to accommodate the guests during the busy spring break. I can't say enough good about the manager, Marlene. Not only did she take care of a billing issue for me that a sister hotel couldn't seem to resolve, but she had it all taken care of within 15 minutes of our arriving! She was so friendly and helpful. She also called a cab for us when needed for Universal. (we found the $8-10 for the fare more than worth it!) We also ventured to Disney from here and it was a…

title: Booking the room
review: Dear Carrie D.,  Thank you for your kind words about our hotel and staff! We are so happy that you enjoyed your stay with us and shared your great feedback here on TripAdvisor! It was nice to hear that Marlene provided you with exceptional service. I will make sure to pass your compliments to her and share it with all of our staff members. They work very hard to make every guest feel special.  Thank you so much for staying with us and we hope to see you in the near future.  Best regards,  Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Great Value- So close to Universal
review: We stayed here for one night while visiting Universal Studios and it was perfect.  The location is excellent, as it's only a 5 minute drive to Universal.  The beds were comfortable.  The breakfast was excellent with lots to choose from, and parking was free.  Would definitely stay again.

title: Close to Universal Studios & Spacious Rooms
review: Just stayed for 4 nights with a large group of high school students and loved this location as it's extremely close to Universal Studios. The rooms are spacious, allowing plenty of room to spread out. Our room had 2 queen beds and a pull-out couch - plenty of sleeping options.  The staff-both front desk & housekeeping-was extremely helpful & friendly. This is my second time staying at this hotel and I look forward to returning again someday!

title: Great place to stay near Universal
review: Dear cruisintheusa,  We were delighted to hear that you had a wonderful stay with us and it was consistent with your previous stay. It was nice to hear that our staff provided you with an exceptional service. They work very hard to make every guest feel special. Thank you so much for staying with us and we hope to see you in the near future.  Best regards,  Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Quiet, comfortable, no-frills Universal hotel
review: We stayed here for a family vacation to Universal because of the great location. It is about a 3/4 mile walk along a nice walking path to Universal from the hotel. You do have to cross a busy street, but there is a crosswalk and a stoplight and we crossed with ease. There is also a free shuttle to Universal that leaves from the hotel right next door if you prefer not to walk. There are restaurants and fast food within walking distance as well. Our room was very clean and well furnished. The mattresses and linens were comfortable. Best pillows ever! Breakfast was nice and included hot items like eggs, bacon, biscuits and gravy, and waffles as well as fruit, cereal, and yogurt. The breakfast staff was great and kept everything well stocked and fresh. My only minor complaint would…

title: Close to Universal Studios
review: Dear Marha G.,  Thank you for taking a moment to post your great comments about our hotel, we really appreciate your feedback. I am glad to see that you enjoyed the cleanliness and location of the hotel. I am sorry for the issue with the sofa bed mattress. If you did not report the issue to the hotel stuff, I would greatly appreciate if you please email me at imarsee@buffalolodgimg.com with the room number so we can take steps to fix the problem to alleviate such issues for the future guests. Again, thank you for your valuable time and we look forward to having another opportunity to be your choice of hotel on your next visit to Orlando.  Best regards, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Good Choice Near Universal
review: I stayed in this hotel for a one night Orlando trip with my family.  Nothing fancy, but the room was a good size (two beds, plus a fold out couch in a slightly "separate" seating area), clean, everything worked, friendly service.  Check-in was painless.  Another advantage over larger, more expensive properties--no "resort fee" for amenities that you probably don't use anyway, and plenty of free parking.  And, on top of that, free in-room WiFi.  The bed was comfortable, the air conditioning worked, and the bathroom was fine,   A simple, free breakfast is offered as well.  Right off of I-4 and very close to Universal if that's your destination, and only about a 20 minute drive to Disney World/Sea World area.  Tough to beat for the price.  If, like us, you plan to use the hotel to…

title: Great Trip
review: Stayed there last week with a group of dancers and could not have asked for better accommodations.  Rooms spacious and clean.  Staff was pleasant and courteous.  The location to Universal Studios was fantastic.  Not one single complaint.  Thank you for your hospitality!

title: I love this hotel
review: Dear Dancerfan,   Thank you for your comments in regards to the Comfort Suites Universal Studios Area. I am excited to read your positive comments and have shared it with the hotel's team members. We hope to see you again on your next visit to the Orlando area.   Warmest Regards,   Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Great stay at good price.
review: Convenient to Universal Studios, and close to good places to eat. The staff is *very* helpful and friendly. At one point the lock on my door simply refused to let me in (the battery died?), and they had it fixed (late in the evening) within ten minutes. The shower head was not very good (low pressure, terrible for washing hair) but it was changed out (without me asking) during my stay to a really good one. The beds are comfy and the place is clean. The location is quiet and convenient. I've stayed here twice and will stay again if I visit Orlando in the future. The only thing I didn't like is that the heater/AC cycles on and off. I prefer that the fan run continuously (in addition to the heat/ac) for the white noise.

title: Great stay!
review: Dear Snooray,  I just wanted to take this time to personally thank you for giving such a great review of your recent visit to the Comfort Suites Universal Studios Area. We are very happy that you enjoyed your stay with us. We are commited to give you the same experience every time you come to visit. Your opinion is very important to us. Again, thank you for your valuable time and we look forward to having another opportunity to be your choice of hotel on your next visit to Orlando.  Sincerely, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Great value for money
review: My family and I stayed here on vacation while visiting Universal Studio's and Disney. Our check in was smooth and the desk personnel were very nice. Our room was am nice size with a sitting area. The room was quiet and clean. The beds were comfortable and we loved the pillows. It was a great place to relax after long days at the parks. The pool wasn't heated, but nice and the hot tub helped ease the muscles after a lot of walking. The breakfast area was clean and well stocked every morning. The breakfast area attendant did an outstanding job! The building is secured at 10:00 PM and requires a key to enter, which made us feel good.  The only issue I noticed was a security guard that appeared to be "out like a light" when we came in one evening around 11:00 PM. I'm not sure if he…

title: Great 'Mid range" hotel two minutes drive from Universal, with Shuttle, Free wifi, Free Parking and Free Breakfast
review: My 5 star rating takes account that this is a mid level hotel as it obviously cannot compare so well to a luxury high end hotel.  That said, it was clean, comfortable and pleasant.  The sound proofing was pretty good and we slept really well.  They provide toiletries but no water in the fridge so buy it nearby (at a drugstore) for a quarter of the price in the little shop on site.  Breakfast included an excellent range of continental breakfast items, toaster, waffle maker and a limited hot choice.  The only downer was that we suspected the omelettes/scrambled egg were made from re-hydrated egg... but the rest was great.  Free tea and coffee all day.  Shared shuttle to/from parks till 8pm.  You have to reserve in person from 7am and places are saved on a first come first served…

title: Pleasant stay at a reasonable price
review: Dear Essexfirlin Texas,   Thank you for taking the time to submit your very positive and informative  review for your recent stay at the Comfort Suites Universal Studios Area. We glad that you had a comfortable  stay with us during your recent trip and we hope that we can again serve your lodging needs when visiting the Orlando area.  Best regards, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: COMFORT SUITES UNIVERSAL STUDIOS AREA
review: Nice hotel. Close to universal studios. There is a shuttle service that takes you from the hotel (easy walk to the shuttle stop next door) to universal studios. Get the passes ahead of travel time from the counter at the next door hotel. Cab ride is just $7 in case if the shuttle times do not work out for you.  Free breakfast - very ordinary as expected (given the price of stay).   Printers were fine. I was not able to print the PDF (bought tickets to legoland from the hotel), but the front desk was very helpful printing it out.  Stayed with family. Felt safe and relaxed. I would recommend this hotel to anyone that wants to stay with family at a budget price.

title: The place to stay off site for Universal Studios
review: Dear Sean S,  Thank you for your positive feedback. I am very glad to hear that our location was very convenient for you while visiting the Orlando and Universal Studios! Hope that you'll find your way back to our hotel on your next trip to Orlando in the near future.  Best regards, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Great value and location
review: We visited in Oct 2014. Weather was perfect, sunny and 75 degrees. Hotel is within walking distance of Universal Studios, but it is quiet a walk, probably 15-20 min. Most hotels are in the same area unless you are staying at one of the Universal Studios Resorts. There is a shuttle available, but it fills up quickly so be sure and get your pass early in the morning. The hotel is clean and has a great breakfast and it is complimentary. Service  and price is great also. I would stay here again!

title: Squeaky floors!
review: We were very comfortable at this hotel and especially pleased with the location so close to Universal Studios, our destination for this trip.  The only concern we had was noise from the rooms upstairs.  The floors are very squeaky!  The breakfast buffet was excellent!

title: Excellent choice
review: Dear DitsyDonna,  Thank you for leaving your feedback about your experience staying with us! We are glad to hear that you found our hotel location and amenities favorable! I'm very sorry that you were disturbed from the noise coming from upstairs. I would greatly appreciate if you please email me at imarsee@buffalolodgimg.com with the room number so we can take steps to fix the problem to alleviate such issues for the future guests. I truly hope that if you are in the area again you will give us another chance to welcome you to our hotel.  Sincerely, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Amazing value top standard.
review: The main purpose of our visit was a three day outing to Universal Studios and Islands of Adventure.  As we didn't have a car for those couple of days, we thought the location was very good.  It's approx 20 min walk from the suites to the entrance of Univ. Studios, depending on how quick you walk.  Would recommend the shuttle if you have to consider younger kids.  However, a lot of time could be wasted in traffic for parking lots and shuttle drop off.  The rooms were adequately spacious, for four adults, very clean and towels were changed daily without being requested. Mini suite,with seating area,  fridge, microwave, and tea/coffee making facilities. Breakfast was good with a selection of cereals, waffle making, breads, bagels, pastries, yogurts, boiled eggs, cheese and a…

title: Great place and good management
review: Dear GMTDublin,  Thank you very much for taking the time to post this great informative review of our property. We appreciate you sharing your experience with other travelers. We are glad to hear you liked our location, amenities and staff, and happy to know when your travel plans bring you to the area, we will be the hotel of your choice. Thank you for your loyalty. We look forwarded to welcoming you back again soon!   Best regards, Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Great place! Wonderful stay!
review: Free parking, wi-fi and breakfast. Large rooms with comfortable beds, docking stations for ipads and iphones, fridge and flatscreen tv with many channels. Only complaint very bad pressure on the shower.

title: Nice
review: We only stayed one night we were on our way to a cruise. The hotel was very clean and comfortable. It is across the street from universal studios and is near some restaurant's. The staff was very nice

title: Not bad
review: Dear Paula H.,  Thank you for taking the time to review our property and letting others know of your experience! Your feedback is appreciated and valued. We look forwarded to welcoming you back on your next trip to Orlando!  Sincerely,  Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Great stay!
review: Place was clean and was easy to check in. Plenty of parking and the desk was very knowledgable of attractions and places to go in the area. Standard room but there was def plenty of space to stretch out. Came here on a recommendation. Had continental breakfast there....

title: Everything you need.
review: Dear Tino L.,  Thank you so much for taking the time to post your review for our Comfort Suites Universal Studios Area. I’m glad you had a good stay. Our goal with each and every guest is to provide exellent customer service, and I am sure that on your next visit we will exceed your expectations. We look forward  to seeing you again soon!   Best regards,  Irina Marsee, General Manager

title: Great service and clean
review: My family and I stayed here 3 nights. The lobby/Breakfast area was great, very nice and clean. The staff at the front desk couldn't have been more helpful. They were incredibly courteous and friendly. We asked them to a bit of a later check-out, and after giving us an extra hour at first, the lady at the front-desk gave us an extra 2 hours without us asking for it. Zero worries about the staff here.  The rooms are incredibly spacious and clean. The beds and pillows are great too.  The hotel also offers shuttles to Disney & Universal through their neighboring hotels. The walk over to the hotels is 1 minute so don't worry about needing to hop on over.   Overall, a stress-free, relaxing stay.

title: Wonderful, close and reasonably priced
review: I found this hotel after researching proximity to Universal, size of room, shuttle services, and breakfast.  This hotel has all of this.  The customer service was great- super friendly staff, and the breakfast was great.  Rooms were clean, and the hotel has a great hot tub and pool area. My teens favorite feature FREE WIFI.  My only word of advice is BOOK YOUR SHUTTLE early.  You have to walk next door to HIE to get a shuttle and you have to reserve your spot.  If you don't go early or even the night before you may not get a seat.  This is hands down one of the best hotels in the area.  Enjoy!!!

title: The Best
review: Thank you very much for the fantastic review of your stay with us! We look forward to serving you again! Happy Holidays!

title: What a great place to stay!
review: I had a whole month to plan our family vacation and the reviews for Comfort Suites were incredibly good. I was sure it was to be great stay and indeed it was! There was not one negative thing I could say about our 7 nights there.  The beds were the most comfortable and we had a hard time getting up in the mornings. Breakfast, pool, security, parking, room staff, front desk. Excellent!  Kudos to the staff. We will be back next year.

title: Unbelievable!
review: billybryan123, Thank you for taking the time to write such a nice review of your stay with us! I'm very happy to hear you enjoyed your week vacation and will look forward to seeing you next year! Happy Holidays!

title: No Theme Park Shuttle
review: We just returned home after staying there for five nights.  The room was fantastic!  There was plenty of room ... the beds were really comfortable ... choice of pillows ... and a really great complimentary breakfast!  The breakfast consisted of fresh made waffles, eggs, bacon/sausage, cereals, fruit, yogurt, pastries, toast/bagels/english muffins, as well as coffee, tea and hot chocolate.  All this for less than we've paid recently for places not nearly so nice.  We weren't interested in the theme parks and had our own car, so getting around wasn't an issue for us.  We had some business to transact from back home and it was no problem getting and sending faxes.  We did want to attend Aquatica and wanted to reserve our tickets in advance.  The computer and printer in the business…

title: Good location for Universal
review: Pros: About a 1/2 mile from Universal Studios; rooms are sizable and come with a pull-out couch; free shuttle service at a sister hotel two buildings down; free continental breakfast(had bacon and eggs on Friday morning); free parking. Cons: Although recently renovated, still slightly run down; room had a slight odor by the front door, but not bad enough to go through the ordeal of switching rooms; water pressure could have been better; could hear noise above us slightly(try to get top floor if available).  Would stay here again just due to being so close to Universal and the great price. Situated between extended living quarters and was a bit a hassle to have to walk to another hotel for a shuttle. Really good restaurant around the corner(see my review on Border Tex-Mex).

title: One of the best hotels I have stayed
review: mgdbythesea, We appreciate you sharing your experience about your recent stay with us. I'm glad to see you would consider us again! I'm sorry if you felt the water pressure was not adequate. We are currently testing out new shower heads to see if there will be a signifcant change in pressure, as we tested all of our equipment and found it to be working at 100%. We look forward to serving you again!

It does not have to be an expensive hotel to be great. The best example is this Comfort Suites. Rooms are big and very clean. Employees are happy and always greeting you. This hotel has a great location. It is close to International Drive, to restaurants, walking distance from Universal Studios and some 18 to 20 min from MCO( Orlando Intl Airport). You can access easily I4 to go west or east if needed. At night is quiet even though there are families with small children. It has free breakfast, and it is good with variety.Also has free shuttle to some attractions. I travel very often due to my job and normally I select the same hotel in a city if the rooms are good and staff is helpful. In here the staff is over the word helpful. All of them are very good, but Sandy is…

title: Lovely Hotel, friendly Staff, well worth a stay
review: JGon, Thank you for the tremendous review of your stay with us! I appreciate you acknowledging my hard working staff and for singling out Sandy, who is truly a guest service specialist! I'm happy you found a home away from home when you are visiting Orlando, so we will look forward to seeing you again!!

title: Nice place for an overnight stay
review: A older style CS, and showing some wear and tear.  In high tourist area, to be expected. There for overnight stay, it was clean and Staff good. Need to watch preventive maintenance. Sink was slow, and took 10 minutes to drain-not good. Near highway but not bothered by noise.

title: It was a fine, average hotel
review: The hotel was fine - near Universal, pretty clean and affordable.  The rooms were a little run down - showing normal wear and tear probably- but mostly clean.  Smelled heavily of chemicals when we walked in, but I think we got there just as it was turned. The water pressure was really low in the shower (as other reviews noted).  The breakfast was just pastries, some breads and cereals and make it yourself waffles - which is not all that convenient when there are 40 people at breakfast.  It wasn't a bad breakfast, just kind of plain. Did have fruit and decent coffee though.  The only time we spoke to staff was when we checked it. We asked about the heated pool and were told that they had not turned it on in forever and had no plans to do so during our stay.  Kind of disappointing…

title: Good for a weekend stay.
review: Amy, Thank you for the review of your stay with us! I'm sorry you felt the hotel was average, as we strive for greatness. We have had the water pressure checked and found no issues. We replace or clean our shower heads every quarter as part of our preventative maintenance program. We do serve hot items on our breakfast as well, such as eggs, sausage, bacon and sometimes biscuits and gravy, so I apologize this was not noticed. I don't know why or who gave you the information that we have not turned on our hot tub in a long time, as it runs 365 days a year (except when we are performing maintenance). I will be looking into this with my staff to ensure this is not being conveyed to our guests. We certainly hope you will visit us again in the future!

title: Came back again...some improvements since last visit
review: I recently stayed at this hotel with my three children (ages 14, 13, & 11) and sister for three nights.  The location is quite good for Universal Studios. For fit people who walk briskly, you can get from the hotel to the park in about 20-25 minutes.  The drawback is that there are several major roads to cross which would be a bit scary with small children.  Taxis are easily called by the front desk and easy to get outside to the City Walk area.  The five of us opted to walk most mornings and evenings, but after 11:30 PM we didn't feel too safe so we got a minivan taxi.  It only cost $5.40.    The hotel is on the older side but it was clean and didn't smell.  Breakfast was nothing special, but they did have a waffle maker so that made the kids happy.  I would recommend this…

title: Great service!
review: 5Travellers1263, We appreciate you taking time to share your experience at the Comfort Suites. You are correct, we are located in a busy area, just outside of Universal Studios. We normally recommend to our guest to take the free Universal Shuttle or taxi to the park, as walking can be difficult. The Comfort Suites is a 13 year old property that was renovated at the beginning of 2012. We do hope you will visit us again when your travels bring you back to Orlando!

title: Fantastic staff and VERY clean hotel
review: Stayed in a 2 queen bed suite this time. The room was clean with no noticeable odors. On my last visit I complained that the water pressure was low in the shower ( I read of other similar complaints) but had adequate pressure this time. The breakfast was the same as our last visit...biscuits,gravy and sausage patty...I guess they have some egg products sometimes but I have yet to see that. Thank goodness for the waffle makers!  Check-in and check-out was fast and the desk people were friendly and courteous. This place is close enough to Universal Studios  so if you want to walk..it's not that far (enter in at the bus lot). Overall...good stay!

title: Great hotel and great location...
review: Stayed at the Comfort Suites for 2 nights for our visit to Universal Studios.  The hotel was very nice and clean.  Breakfast was great.  The only complaint I had was the hot water was not very hot when taking showers.  I would definitely stay here again.

title: Brilliant location and nice room
review: Jacquelin R, I'm so pleased you enjoyed your stay with us! I was sorry to hear that your shower was not hot enough. We are not dealing with any hot water issues that I'm aware of, but will certainly keep an eye out for any problems. Thank you for choosing the Comfort Suites!

title: Great hotel! Would stay again
review: We stayed at the Comfort Suites in September 2014 and really enjoyed our stay here. Shuttle service to Universal was at the sister hotel next door (short 2 minute walk) which ran daily every 40 minutes or so (bare in mind we went at down season), however you can walk to the resort also. The reception staff were very helpful and friendly.We used the I-ride shuttle a lot and so it was brilliant that the bus stop was just across from the hotel. The breakfast provide was quite basic, toast, eggs, pastries, etc but did the job and saved time and money looking for breakfast in the morning. Room cleaned every day and very spacious. Overall a good stay.

title: Good location, friendly staff
review: AMehmet, Thank you for the nice review of your stay with us! We take great pride in delivering top quality service and hope you will think of us next time your travels bring you to Orlando!

title: Excellent Universal Partner Hotel
review: Stayed here one night in March with a buddy as we explored Florida and caught some baseball for spring training. We hopped around, using points to get discounted or free rooms each night, so we stayed in six different hotels - this was my favorite of the trip.   The room was fantastic, newly renovated, comfy beds, and real quiet which is rare for a hotel near Disney or Universal. The people working there were real nice, there was a Walgreens and restaurants within walking distance and while we didn't go to Universal, you could walk there or take a shuttle.  Fantastic option if you're in the area.

title: Excellent value for money!
review: We only stayed there one night (visit to Universal Studios) and it was an excellent choice. Rooms are big, clean with really comfortable beds. Free hot breakfast with wide variety. Front desk staff were really helpful and friendly . 20 min walking distance to Universal Studios. Free bus shuttle to Universal Studios from Holiday Inn located in front of this hotel.

title: Pleasant surprise
review: Paquita, Thank you, we appreciate the nice review of your stay with us! Next time you visit Orlando, please keep us in mind!

title: Bumped by Hilton.....
review: We were in a different and terrible hotel nearby and stopped at the front desk and were promptly attended. The staff is all very nice and ready to make you feel satisfied. They gave us a good rate and ready to move in.   The hotel seems recently renovated, is very clean and updated. The room is surprising very spacious. We had two queen beds and has also an extra space with a sofa bed, has also a fridge and a microwave, great room. The bathroom is also clean and the whole hotel is well maintain.   The breakfast is really completed and fill all our needs, they even opened another room with more seats because the hotel full, specially during the weekend.   The pool is ok, could be better but we could spent a morning just relaxing. Has a business center with computer and a printer…

title: Perfect stay
review: Nataly G, We appreciate the great review of our Comfort Suites. Our #1 priority is our guests! We hope you will visit us again and I can promise the same level of service, if not better! Thank you!

title: Up all Night
review: Homewood Suites did not honor our reservation and we were sent to Confort Suites.  I have to say it was a blessing in disguise.  Abdul, the reception manager was excellent, charming and welcoming. The hotel is clean, and confortable and breakfast is very good.  I would recommend this hotel for any family coming to Orlando.  Abdul, keep it up.....

title: good hotel close to attractions
review: Stayed one night in July 2014. It is a good hotel to stay around attractions. Rooms are nice, clean and big enough. Breakfast is good and enough. Recommend to go Riverwalk if you stay around. I will recommend this hotel.

title: first rate helpers
review: Oznar, Thank you for the nice review of your stay with us! We look forward to serving you again in the future!

title: First Family Vacation!!
review: This Comfort Suites Hotel is in the same class as most Comfort Hotels. What makes the difference is all the pleasant employees the go out their way to make your stay comfortable. Specially, I like to mention the lady in the breakfast room. She keeps everything stocked, so even the late comers have the same choice as the early birds. The whole place is clean and run very efficiently. Highly recommendable

title: 55th Birthday celebration
review: Max G, I'm very happy to hear you enjoyed your stay at our Comfort Suites! Thank you and please visit us again!

title: Great!
review: My husband and I were planning on how to celebrate our 10 year anniversary and thought what better way than to take the kids to Disney, Seaworld and Universal Studios.  I planned and planned and researched every hotel and decided on Comfort Suites and boy am I glad I did. The staff was AMAZING to the kids and was extremely nice. What I really appreciated was during breakfast, the manager came out with his coffee and told the maintenance man a happy birthday and sorry he missed it and talked for a few mintues until he saw the lady who set up breakfast (who was a rockstar!!) hurrying to re-fill stations and he asked her how she was doing and if she needed any help and to let him know if she did. In a matter of 5 minutes I saw the manager meet, converse on personal levels, offer…

title: An Unexpected Stay
review: We were returning from a trip to Key West and decided to stop early.  We made an awesome choice.   Our king suite is truly wonderful.  I couldn't ask for a better accommodation.   The suite appears to be newly remodeled and is spotless. We were greeted by the nicest desk clerk that Mae is feel right at home.   The location is great and the pool and hot tub are very nice.

title: Summer good times
review: Eduman4260, We are extremely happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us! Thank you for choosing the Comfort Suites and be sure to keep us in mind!

title: Nice hotel, pleasant staff
review: Excellent location near all the attractions. Great place for families and couples. The continental breakfast buffet is a nice touch with a variety for everyone. The staff was friendly and helpful with area information and directions. Great value!

title: Great location, large rooms
review: Patrick A, Thank you very much for the review of our hotel. We are thrilled you enjoyed your stay with us!

title: Convenient, simple, Great Customer Service
review: We stayed here in May 2014.  Hotel was clean and quiet, staff friendly and helpful. The rooms have obviously been updated and they have done a nice job. The only negative thing I can say it that it was very hot and the air conditioner did not work well so nights were very warm. The shower was no surprise, the water pressure was been mentioned in other reviews, it is not great but serviceable so no worries. Breakfast is ok, we made waffles , coffee was icky but did not expect much. Cafeteria space very clean and we had no issues getting a place to sit. Hotel is very close to Universal, we drove there but you could easily walk in about 15 min. Lots of places to eat very close, you could walk if you wanted. We chose Fridays which was good and also purchased takeout pizza one night…

title: Would give 10 stars if I could....
review: Stayed at this hotel for 8 nights with my husband, my 4 year old and 13 month old daughters. I was so impressed with this hotel - the rooms, the facilities and most importantly, the staff.   The room was clean and well appointed.  The beds/pillows were amazingly comfortable. I really liked having a somewhat of a separate sitting area where I could still keep an eye on my girls while they played on the beds.  Breakfast each morning was great.  The selection ran from eggs, sausage, waffles, fruit, pastries and fruit etc. I also really loved having complimentary coffee available all day/night in the lobby breakfast area.  Pool was clean and my girls enjoyed themselves to the max. There is also a Jacuzzi.  The business centre was also great and I was surprised that printing here was…

title: Great location for Universal
review: Shazanna, I cannot thank you enough for the wonderful review of your stay with us. It was truly a pleasure meeting you and the family and hope you will visit us again!

title: Great Stay
review: We live about 2 1/2 hours from Orlando but wanted to do a 2 day trip to Universal as a "beginning of summer" quick vacation.  After a day at the park we were able to leave the garage and drive the back road down Major Blvd.  Such a great quick trip down a now traffic road.  Amazing location.  We had prepaid for the room and even though the internet was down when we arrived, the front desk got us to our room right away.  We also loved that the cost didn't go up even though we had 5 people (2 parents, 20 year old son, a teen and a tween)  BIG perk that can be a pain while traveling.  The kids loved the pool and restaurants were close for dinner.  Beds comfortable and all enjoyed bacon at breakfast.  We would stay here again for another 2 day Universal trip

title: Nice property for the price
review: cherjbr, I'm glad you found our Comfort Suites for your 2 day get away! We are perfectly situated to Universal Studios, with easy access in and out of the park. Be rest assured, you now have a home away from home, when you decide to visit Orlando again! Thank you!

title: Very nice property
review: Stayed here for three nights. Staff is very friendly. The hotel is very close to Universal Studios and a shuttle ride is available to the theme park via Holiday Inn Express across the street. Breakfast was ok and rooms are spacious. Also has a nice pool, jacuzzi, and gym! Would stay here again!

title: Acceptable Value
review: Conveniently very close to Universal and Carrabbas (best nearby resteraunt). The rooms were clean but smelled of highly chemical cleaner after the maid came each day. Musty smell from a/c units, maybe because of the heat in Florida? Breakfast was ok. The egg discs for lack of a better term were questionably gross. The pool was fairly clean. The place sort of lack sparkle of other area places. Hotel has a security guard posted at night, which made us kind of question how safe the neighborhood is. My husband lost an outfit, which the maid says she never saw. The hotel wasn't very receptive to the problem after talking to the front desk repeatedly. I guess you get what you pay for in the end. Glad to be home.

title: Good value
review: Ashley H, Thank you for sharing your experience with the traveling public. We use Ecolab products for our bathroom cleanliness needs and are the most widely used in the Hotel Industry. Also, we keep security on duty, not because the area is unsafe, but to ensure there is an extra pair of eyes on the property in the late evenings. We take the safety of our guests and employees seriously. In regards to the missing outfit, I have checked with my housekeeping department and the outfit was not located. If it happens to show up, we will contact you directly. I'm sorry your stay was not perfect, but be assured, we take guest service seriously and only want to see our guests 100% satisfied. I'm always available to talk with my guests, so feel free to contact me directly if you would like to discuss this matter further. Thank you!  Sincerely,  Eric Krakowski General Manager

title: Great Value!
review: We stood 2 nights here. Great location. Everything ok. Quiet close to noisy street and you have to get used to plastic plates for the breakfast. Breakfast could be better. But the staff at the lobby was superbe. Special the older lady hflped a lot wigh good tips. Nice pool

title: Excellent hotel. Would definitely stay again.
review: cristiansuiza, Thank you very much for the nice review of your stay with us. We hope you will consider staying with us again, if your travels bring you back to Orlando!

title: Good location, but there were ants.
review: We were visiting the Orlando area for three nights.  It was a great value, excellent breakfast and very close to Universal Studios.  The exercise room was well-equipped and the pool and jacuzzi was nice.  My only negative comment would be about the water pressure, it was a little low for my liking. Overall, a clean place to stay at a reasonable value!

title: Great stay and very close to Universal
review: I recently stayed with my family.I was pleasantly greeted with a water bottle and a bag of pretzels when I checked in.Staff was very friendly. The room was spacious and clean.The bathroom had a tub with a shower and also a seperate shower! The breakfast was also great and free. There is a Universal shuttle available next door. Overall we were very happy with our stay.

title: Good Location, Good Value
review: egarbe6, We at the Comfort Suites wanted to thank you for the nice review of your stay with us! It appeared you enjoyed your stay with us so just just wondering, what we could have done better in order to improve our rating from a 3 to a 4 or 5? I'm always available for my guests, so feel free to contact me, at your convenience, at 407-363-1967 to discuss further. Again, thank you for staying with us!   Sincerely,  Eric Krakowski General Manager

title: Clean & Quiet
review: Recently stayed for 2 days - in a 2/QN Suite.    Room rate was very resonable.    Room was nice (for the price) - and the property (while worn) was acceptable (esp for the price).    A few concerns though:  TV:    The TV is small (only 32") and the remote provided does not allow anything other than "basic" TV operation (with kids, had our XBox, and plugged the XBOX into the side-HDMI, but the remote would not allow us to select that input).    We discovered a work-around and the kids were happy, but the manager stated "plugging anything into the TV messes up the cable signal loop for the entire property" - and that is simply not a true statement.     The remote was selected because it was the cheapest remote available to outfit the property (pls note that all other hotels have…

title: Can't say enough good about this one...
review: MCPO-USN-2011, I wanted to thank you for sharing your experience with the traveling public and address the concerns you outlined. Our TV's are the standard size for Comfort Suites Hotels, you are correct, hooking up a game system does not mess up the cable signal loop, so I apologize if you were given wrong information. We are more than happy to make considerations for our guests, when it comes to hooking up a game system. We would normally just send someone from maintenance to ensure the hook up is done properly to avoid an damage to our TV's. I have recently walked a number of rooms and verified the water temp and pressure and all seems fine. I will be sure to monitor this closer going forward to ensure the proper temperature and pressure if available to my guests. I can assure you, this has nothing to do with cost saving, as we want our guests to be as comfortable as possible. We completed a multi level rennovation at the end of 2011 and continue to upgrade our services and ammenities to ensure the highest level of satisfaction for our guests.
