Please feel free to contact me directly at 407-363-1967, if you visit Orlando again and I will make sure you are taken care of. Thank you for choosing the Comfort Suites.  Sincerely,  Eric Krakowski General Manager

title: Great Experience
review: We found this hotel clean & Quiet.  We needed to get a taxi to go out to supper but restaurants are not too far.  They offered a shuttle to Universal at the Holiday Inn next door.  The first day they were all booked and we got a taxi to Universal , with tip it cost us $10.00 there and $10.00 back. The second day, the shuttle didn't show up after waiting 40 min. We got another taxi.  The third day we got on the shuttle bus but had no seat.     I would stay at this hotel again, Knowing that I might have to get a taxi.

title: Loved everything about this hotel
review: We loved everything about this hotel and would definitely stay here again.    My family and i stayed here for our first visit to Universal Studios in Orlando in 2013.  My kids still rave about their wonderful stay at Comfort Suites a year after we stayed there.    The room was spacious even with the two queens and the pullout. The beds were comfortable especially after a long and exhausting day at the parks.  Housekeeping did a wonderful job keeping the room clean. Staff was accommodating and was very helpful as we constantly asked for directions and advice. And of course, the complimentary breakfast was a hit with my kids.    The free shuttle service (shared with a hotel next door) was a plus for tourists like us.

title: Great stay
review: Without_Wings, We are glad you choose our Comfort Suites when you visited Orlando. Thank you for the nice review and we hope to serve you again in the future!

title: Great stay and comfortable
review: Another great stay at this hotel. Stayed here for visits to disney world, Daytona 500 and universal. Clean rooms and linens. Friendly staff. Was a little crowded at the complimentary breakfast, but had another room opened up for seating. Great price at the friends and family rate. Would definitely stay here again!!!!!

title: Great price, room, location and staff
review: Ron H, We appreciate the great review of your stay with us. Please keep us in mind if your travels bring you back to Orlando!

title: Convenient to multiple parks
review: Staff very friendly and helpful. Breakfast was great. Everything was clean. Had the best hotel sleeps in a very long time and the room was very spacious for 2 queens and pullout. The only slight inconvenience was pool and much needed hot tub was only open untill 10 when it could have stayed open just a bit longer.  I would definitely stay here again.

title: Great offsite hotel for visiting Universal orlando.
review: We stayed here for 5 nights in late Dec. for a surprise trip with the kids. This property doesn't have a lot of features. But it was very clean, comfy beds, free wifi and parking. It's less than a mile to the US entrance so it was very convenient. The free breakfast was adequate, but not much variety. It was perfect for our needs- we spend most of our time enjoying the theme parks. Looking forward to a return trip after Diagon Alley is completed.

title: Pretty happy guest
review: jeannine b, I just wanted to thank you for choosing our Comfort Suites for your surprise trip to Orlando. We are very happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to serving you again in the future!

title: Great Choice for Trip to Universal
review: This hotel was very clean and very comfortable.  The beds and bedding were nice and comfortable.  Everything was working in our room.  The house keeping crew and the front desk people were very inviting.  Very nice to talk to and often asked if there was anything we needed.  We stayed in this hotel for 8 nights.  The reason that I rate at 4 is because the breakfast bar was not that great.  The eggs were often mushy/watery or runny and or dry on another occasion.  Or they would serve round pancake type eggs that tasted like cardboard.  They changed the type of eggs served everyday.  They often ran out of food and took a long time to replenish.  Other than that, the stay was super.

title: Clean Room and great location to Universal Studios
review: Anabel_rivas, I wanted to thank you for the nice review of your stay with us. I want to apologize that the breakfast was not up to your standards. We use the best ingredients and products available to ensure quality, freshness and consistency. We certainly hope you will visit us again, if your travels bring you back to Orlando!  Eric Krakowski, CHA General Manager

title: The best hotel I have been to in a long time
review: After reading the reviews here on Trip Advisor, we selected this hotel for our after-Christmas visit to Universal Studios.  Every employee, from the manager who greeted us when we arrived to the housekeeping staff who helped us get our luggage in the room, was extremely polite and helpful.  Breakfast was good each morning, and the kitchen attendant was friendly and made sure the food was constantly being replenished and that the serving areas stayed clean.  The front desk staff greeted us each morning with a smile, and they were very helpful with information about the area.    This hotel is close enough that you can actually walk to Universal, but the front desk staff told us about a car service they utilize that will take a family of 4 to Universal for a flat rate of $8. We…

title: Great Hotel for Universal Studios
review: Good location for Universal Studios. Rooms very clean, comfortable and a good size. Staff was very friendly and went out of their way to offer help and suggestions. Choice of food at breakfast was very good although seating area could have been a bit larger. You may not want to rely on the bus service to Universal, it is a bit limited if you are not planning to spend the entire day there. Parking is free for Florida Residents and only $5.00 for everyone else after 6:00pm at Universal.

title: DON'T GO TO THIS HOTEL... Got Robbed
review: valerie b, We appreciate the nice review of your stay with us. Please keep us in mind when your travels bring you back to Orlando!

title: Very good choice to visit Universal Studios Orlando
review: The hotel is quite nice in location, breakfast, and pretty much everything,. except for the fact I got robbed from my room hotel over $4000 in cash and none in the hotel was held responsible. The hotel manager, Sr. Eric Krakowski even told me 'this never happened before' but now that im reading the reviews, apparently it did. So, if you read this review, AVOID GOING TO THIS HOTEL. THEY WILL ROB YOUR BELONGINGS AND THEN LIE TO YOU ABOUT IT. The insurance company they work with is not better,. Liberty Mutual Insurance has been trying to convince me via e-mail that it's all my fault that I got robbed.

title: A Good Choice near Universal Orlando
review: Hello Mr. Bruno, First I’m truly sorry that this happened to you.  I can think of nothing more unsettling than being the victim of theft while traveling.  I did not intend to give you the impression we were turning our back on this issue.  Please be assured that we do not take this lightly and are pledging our assistance in any way possible.  Our practice is to file a police report and cooperate with the authorities to the greatest extent possible.  We also investigate internally, interviewing staff and reviewing security logs.  All information is shared with the police.  Please contact me directly at 407-363-1967 as I would like to discuss next steps and how we can assist you in resolving this matter.

title: Overall, above average stay
review: I stayed there three nights with 2 friends (so the 2 queen beds and the sofa bed were really usefull for us) and I don't have anything negative to say about it! The staff is really friendly, the rooms are clean and big enough for three people and the breakfast (included) is just... wow !!! The free shuttle bus to Universal Studios can pick you up and drop you off at the Holiday Inn, it's like a 2 minutes walk from the hotel, you just have to cross the road. We took the shuttle at 8:10am and we were at the park entrance at 8:45, 15 minutes before the opening, so this is pretty fast ! Don't look any further if you're looking for an hotel near Universal Studios !

title: great stay, great staff
review: Stayed there for a weekend for a wedding recently.  Although the hotel was booked completely, you wouldn't know it.  Breakfast buffet was very good.  Wifi has excellent signal.  Room service was very good, and room is extremely clean.  I decided to book a room also for my parents.  The lady not only gave them a room near us, but booked it at the wedding block rate, even though it had expired.  Will definitely stay here again.

title: Good location decent hotel
review: lawcane, Thank you for the very nice review of your recent stay with us! We are glad you enjoyed your stay and hope you will visit us again!

title: Good location for Universal area
review: About the only downside to staying here wasn't the fault of the hotel really.  We were told there was a shuttle from here to Universal.  There wasn't, it's from a nearby hotel and you have to go to that hotel to get the passes also.  After you get over that this hotel is very close to the park, we walked home from Halloween Horror nights 2 nights in a row with no issues at all.  There were a couple of restaurants within walking distance also.  The hotel was clean, having a microwave and mini-fridge was helpful.  The breakfast was alright, I would stay away from the meat and eggs (kinda ick).  The juices, milk, cereal, bagels, etc., were all great though.  There was a tiny "store" where you could get aspirin or chips.  Wi-fi worked well, room was clean, staff was friendly.

title: Nice and Convenient Hotel
review: Dethinwntr, We appreciate you sharing your experience with the traveling public. Sorry if there was a misunderstanding regarding the shuttle service provided by Universal. We selected the Holiday Inn and Suites, next door as the pick up and drop off location due to the buse's inability to maneuver in our parking lot. I'm also sorry to hear you did not like our breakfast, specifically the eggs and meat. We only use fresh product on our breakfast line and prepare/serve based on health department guidlines. We do, however, mix up our selection between scrambled eggs, bacon, sausage and biscuits w/ gravy. We hope you will visit us again and thank you for choosing the Comfort Suites!

title: Clean, comfortable and convenient.
review: This hotel is very near Universal so it was a good choice for us. The room was large with 2 queens and a sofabed. The A/C and fan worked well which was good since we heard a few thumps and bumps during the night. (The hotel is always sold out and busy with families, so can be a bit noisy.) The bathroom was a bit worn, and the tub/shower area was extremely narrow- we had to stand sideways to shower. It has a nice pool and whirlpool. Despite the location, note that the shuttle to Universal does not come to this hotel. You must walk to the Holiday Inn Express at 7:15 in the morning to make a reservation.

title: Comfort Suites Saved Our Trip
review: My family arrived in Orlando, FL after a (7) hour drive and the hotel we had booked was under contruction.  What?  We had no warning whatsoever.  We cancelled immediately and drove right over to the Comfort Suites that's located in the same area.  They gave us a GREAT rate (cheaper than the other place, which had been done online) and we settled in.  EVERYONE, from the Reservationists, to the lady who takes care of the complementary breakfast are so nice and helpful.  The rooms are clean and the pool area is beautiful.  They also have a work out room and a room with internet.  AWESOME!  The location is right across the street from the entrance to Universal Studios and the Island of Adventure and by the BEST restaurant ever (Kobe).  Thank you Comfort Suites!

title: Good hotel
review: pcolachic, Thank you for the fantastic review of your stay with us! We appreciate the kind words and the recognition for our hardwork in serving our guests. We hope to see you again in the future.

title: Good Place to Stay When Visiting Universal Studios
review: Adequate hotel for local business needs. Very close (across the street) from Universal Studios. Hotel generally very busy. Mostly families with children visiting parks. No bar/restaurant on scene, some area restaurants within 5-10 min. walk. Room was clean and adequate, with a separate sitting area, mini fridge and microwave. Daily breakfast just OK, but not bad.

title: Everything we expected and more
review: Ryan T, Just wanted to say thank you for posting the nice review of our hotel. I see you traveled on business, so I was happy you thought we supported the needs of corporate travelers. When we rennovated the hotel, at the end of 2011, we had the corporate traveler in mind, as we added additional plugins along with a new desk and chair in our suites. Please keep us in mind if your travels bring you back to Orlando!

title: Decent place
review: We stayed here for 3 nights in October to visit Universal Studios and Sea World.  The hotel is very conveniently located off the Fla Tpke. and Interstate 4.  It's on a side road across from the entrance to Universal Studios, in an area with other hotels. Check in was quick and easy.  We had requested a room on a high floor away from the elevator and were on the 4th floor.  Being a suite, the room was larger than a regular room because of the sofabed.  There was a small fridge (appreciated!), microwave and coffee maker.  Everything was clean.  The location was pretty quiet. The included daily breakfast was more than enough.. waffles, eggs, sausage/bacon, cereal, muffins and donuts, juice, yogurt... no problem filling up. We took the shuttle across the way at the Holiday Inn to…

title: Comfortable, Clean and Close to Universal Studios!
review: I highly recommend this Comfort Suites if you are planning on going to Universal Studios. Check in was easy and pleasant and the staff were very friendly and helpful. The room itself was clean and very spacious. The front desk even called 15 minutes after check in to make sure everything was to our liking. I've stayed at 5 star hotels that don't bother to do that! The hotel is close to Universal. If you felt energetic and wanted to walk, there is a sidewalk you could take but we saved our feet for the park and opted to take a taxi for about $5 each way. The taxi brought us right to the escalators with no hassle or waiting. We were told that the parking fee for Universal was $16 all day. The hotel has a shuttle service as well but you have to go across the street to the Holiday…

title: the rooms were really spacious and the free breakfast was great!
review: I'm so happy we met or exceeded your expectations. My staff works hard, everyday, to ensure our guests are happy and well taken care of. You will always have a place to stay when you visit Orlando! Thank you!

title: Very convenient to Universal with great value
review: We stayed at this Comfort Suites directly across from Universal Studios parking garage, so it was really convenient to access Universal Studios. There are lots of good restaurants around the area also. The rooms were very clean and spacious and we had 2 queen beds and a pullout sofa in each of our 2 rooms, which was very handy! The free breakfast included in your room breakfast was plentiful with lots of great choices! We will definitely stay here again!

title: Where YOU need to stay when visiting Universal
review: DebbieB, We appreciate the fantastic review of your recent stay with us. I'm so happy to hear we met your expectations and hope you will consider us again when your travels bring you back to sunny Orlando Florida!

title: Perfect for Universal
review: I'd just stayed two nights at an on-site hotel - which is a different caliber of experience but with associated cost.  But that said - one can't get much closer to the parks and if one adds in the value of the breakfast with hot food and the spaciousness of the rooms and the free wifi - it's perfect as a Value-level hotel.  We checked in at around 5pm on Labor Day Saturday - took about 2 minutes!  Our room was perfectly clean as were the hallways and lobby.  We did not explore the pool area or business center.  Wifi was open and good in our room.  Air conditioning was fine as was the water temperature and pressure for showers.  Microwave and fridge etc there for us, although we didn't use it.  We liked the suite aspects with the couch, desk area and very many outlets for…

title: Typical Comfort Inn amenities. Nice fitness center. Walking distance to Universal parks
review: This is a typical Comfort Inn quality hotel with no surprises.  The fitness center is really nice and has more exercise machines than other Comfort Inns I've visited.  The business center is also very private and nice. Breakfast were the usual Comfort Inn items like scramble eggs, sausages, waffle, and other cold items.  We were given a room for the disabled so it was huge.  The room is tidy but still doesn't feel too clean.  It just may be me.  This is a no frill hotel.  The location is definitely worth mentioning.  It is within walking distance to the park entrance.  It took me roughly 30 minutes each way.  There is also a Walgreen and many restaurants within a short 5-10 minute walking distance.    We found a restaurant nearby called Border Grill that serves authentic Mexican…

title: Early Orlando Vacation 2013
review: Thank you for posting a review of your stay with us. I'm sorry you did not feel the suite was clean up to your standards. We take great pride in the overall cleanliness of our hotel, because that is what the traveling public expects and deserves. If you ever stay with us or any other Choice property in the future, please contact guest services to rectify the issue right away. Otherwise, it appeared you had a good time visiting Orlando, so we hope to see you again in the future!

title: Would have been fantastic - if not for the thieving maids!
review: My family and I stayed here for three nights at the beginning of our Orlando trip to take advantage of the early admission into both Universal Orlando Theme Parks. The king size room we occupied was fine. Amenities included: small refrigerator/freezer, microwave, coffee maker and cable TV. Comfort Suites offers inclusive daily hot breakfast, a workout room and outdoor pool. The staff was very helpful and friendly. Check-in and out was easy and quick. Comfort Suites is just one block east of International Drive. Wet n Wild, The Fun Spot and Universal Parks are only five minute drives away. Tip - Book your Comfort Suite stay through Universalorlando.com and you obtain not only tickets for both Universal Parks but you also receive early admission to both parks for the length of…

title: Excellent!
review: Kenny, We appreciate you sharing your experience. We work hard everyday, to ensure our guests enjoy their stay at the Comfort Suites. Thanks again!

title: Great choice for Universal trip
review: Let me preface this by saying, the General Manager Eric K. was very apologetic about the situation and began an internal investigation. However, that does not change the fact that one of the maids took cash from our room and left a mess instead of cleaning. The hotel is in a very good location for Universal and not far from Disney and other Orlando attractions. The hotel next to them offer buses to Universal and if you dont call for bus passes more than 24 hours in advance then you must try the first come first serve line at 7:15am. We had 5 people and fit in the double bed suite comfortably. The couch bed was fairly comfortable and the actual beds were nice. The room was equipped with a pull out desk and small flat screen along with other end tables and coffee tables. The room…

title: Another GREAT stay
review: july 2nd  thru 5th,2013 This the second time to this hotel and it is still great , super clean rooms, a great friendly staff which will help you with all you need. I  highly   recommend this hotel... 5 stars in my book we will be back without a doubt

title: Nice hotel and close to everything!
review: Vinny, Thank you for being a frequent guest of the Comfort Suites. You have posted several nice reviews and I could not be happier you enjoyed your stay with us! Please be sure you let me know when you come back to visit, I would love to meet you. Thanks again!

title: aduquately comfortable
review: we really enjoyed it here.  the people at the front desk were beyond helpful with all of our many, many questions!  it was within walking distance to Universal but we took the shuttle there and a taxi back as it was hot and we did a lot of walking at the park.  The rooms were clean and decent for a family of 4 (2 teens).  Breakfast was really good.  My daughter loved the chocolate chip muffins.  Make sure you don't book a room directly from the hotel.  the hotel is a little expensive but we stayed for about $75 a night in June which was about half of what the hotel was offering.  we would definitely stay here again!

title: Good choice near Universal Studios
review: klkc2005, Thank you for the nice review of your stay with us. We hope you visit us again in the future!

title: Wonderful hotel in any area.
review: reasonable price in terms of the room condition, breakfast and free business center service. friendly desk and room service. convinient shuttle. will stay here again if come to this area for business. the only drawback which all the hotels in that area shares is the inconvinience of food choices and no grocery stores around.

title: A great option in Orlando!
review: We stayed in the Comfort Suites for six nights in May 2013. My husband and I were on a trip through the USA and were looking for a good base near the theme parks and this definitely fitted the bill! The Comfort Suites are conveniently located opposite the Universal complex and a free bus runs from the hotel to the Universal parks daily. As it's also just off the I-40, Disneyworld and SeaWorld complexes are also less than half an hour away. The hotel is very simple, rooms were simply furnished and clean. The bathroom was particularly good, with a strong shower and plenty of space! The hotel also offers a breakfast, which starts at 7am and has a good range of hot and cold food on a buffet - it really sets you up for the rest of the day! All in all, we were really glad we stayed…

title: Worked very well for our family
review: JessOldroyd, We are very thankful you choose our Comfort Suites during your trip across America. Thank you for the nice review and we hope to serve you again in the future.

title: Close to Universal
review: This hotel is located just across from the entrance to Universal Studios. It was a bit of a walk down the long road but not a problem at all. The room was spacious and clean and the beds were comfortable. We had a fun-filled day and had dinner at  the TGI Fridays, which was along the way back to the hotel. The breakfast buffet was fine for our needs. Front desk staff was helpful with any questions we had.

title: Comfort Inn and Suites Major Blvd.
review: Maria R, Your review of your stay with us is much appreciated! We take great pride in delivering top notch service to our guests. We hope you will think of us next time you visit sunny Orlando, FL!

title: Great Birthday Stay!
review: Booked a room with two queen beds via priceline.  Free parking, free shuttle to and from Universal, but had to walk across the way to book seats on the shuttle at the Holiday Inn Express.  Free breakfast, but small seating area and very busy.  About a mile from Universal and located in a great area near the main road, but in a round about where other hotels are located. Easy to find using the GPS and it was clean.   I always stay at the Comfort Suites as their service is pretty consistent and the free parking, free breakfast, and free internet are always a must.

title: We had a wonderful stay!
review: We stayed here at the Comfort Suites for a week while on vacation. It was such a great stay. Sandy at the front desk was such a great help to us. The rooms were so clean. The housekeepers spoke to us each morning and asked if we needed anything. The pool and hot tub was so clean, very hard to find in hotels these days. They have a great hot breakfast included in the rate. We were shocked when the maintenance guy {Angel} was so very nice to everyone as well. He was always talking and laughing with guest a welcomed surprise. The general manager even came out and talked to us and other guest.  We will stay here again if we visit Florida again. They are very close to Universal Studios which is a big plus.

title: Great Stay close to Universal Studios
review: Deb, Thank you, I appreciate you mentioning my staff and Chief Engineer Angel. We do everything we can to make sure our guests feel at home when they stay at the Comfort Suites. Hope to see you again!

title: We had a great experience
review: Great stay with free internet, breakfast, close to universal studios, shopping and restaurants. Clean rooms, king size beds were very comfortable, staff was courteous and friendly. Not a problem to stay here again.

title: Great stay!!
review: Ron H, I'm very happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. Please keep us in mind when your travels bring you to Orlando again!

title: Best of our trip
review: We wanted a place close to Universal that allowed my teenage boys to not share a bed.  This was right on the money!  We walked to and from Universal (saving the $15 parking fee) our first day there - easy to find and a nice, flat walk that was just under a mile each way.  The staff was helpful and curteous throughout our stay.  We dropped a recent purchase when checking in and the front desk clerk called our room before we even realized it was missing!  The breakfast each morning was GREAT with a wonderful free buffet variety including eggs, bacon or sausage, bagels, cereal, yogurt, hard boiled eggs, homemade waffles, muffins, juice, etc.  Our family of 4 (including 2 teenage boys) had plenty of room to hang out watching some TV following our days of sightseeing and the pull out…

title: Better than expected
review: We chose this hotel because we needed something near Universal, something that would sleep 5 and something we could use some AmExp points towards.  We were pleasantly surprised.  We checked in late after having been at Universal all day.  The front desk clerk was nice, the room was clean and very big.  It had two queens plus a pull out queen sofa.  The bathroom was clean.  The only complaint was that the sofa bed was squeaky and kept the one person who slept it in awake.  Breakfast was crowded but they fixed the issue by opening up another room for seating.  It was your usual free fare breakfast but the waffles were tastier than other places.  We would return to this hotel again if we were in the area.

title: Great stay for Universal Studios Orlando
review: Traveler672, Thank you for the nice review of your stay with us. Sorry about the sofa bed, I will make sure my maintenance department is checking the sofa beds thoroughly during our routine inspections. We hope you will visit us again!

title: My Home Away From Home
review: Best option for our family of 5 close to Universal Studios. Our suite had ample space, and was comfortable and quiet on the 3rd floor. Management was very courteous and helpful, and the included hot breakfast was a nice start each day. We used our car to visit Universal (~1 mile) and Seaworld (~10 mi), but free transportation was available, but would've taken longer.

title: Good Stay at this hotel
review: Paul J, We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with the traveling public! We believe in our product and thoroughly enjoy serving our guests. We look forward to serving you again in the future!

title: Excellent experience
review: Dream location with service to match.  Great hospitality.  Absolutely Perfect stay.  I arrived for a short business trip that ended up extending to 340 days.  I have NO complaints.  All the employees were kind, courtious, and knowledgable of area attreactions.  Every morning I woke to a Joyful breakfast and every evening I returned to an Immaculately clean room.   For each and every 340 days this was an incredibly wonderful stay.  Awsome staff, service, and location provided a delightful work as well as Orlando experience.  I even declined to be moved into another facility once my employer realized my work assignment would be extended. Review of their website provides not just the well known attractions but also local area events.  When I wasn't at work I attended many free Art…

title: Great Hotel and Excellent Service!
review: My husband and I stayed just one night and were impressed with the cleanliness of the hotel.   We were pleasantly surprised by the size of the room, the modern updates and it had a mini fridge and a microwave. The free breakfast was a really great deal! There were eggs and sausage patties, make your own regular and blueberry waffles (YUM!), danish, muffins, cereal, milk, yogurt, fruit, bread, english muffins, hard boiled eggs, juice and coffee!!! The staff was attentive, replenishing items just before they ran out.  There was plenty of room to sit and eat. After we arrived home, my husband was unpacking and noticed he forgot two shirts he had hung up in the closet.  I called the hotel and spoke to the manager, Eric.  He sent staff to our room right away to collect the shirts and…

title: Close to Universal Studios
review: FloridaRes_01, it was truly a pleasure assisting you and your husband and I'm glad the shirts were delivered promptly. this is how we do business at the Comfort Suites. All of our guests are important to us and we show that everyday! Thank you so much for the nice review and don't hesitate to contact me directly when you decide to visit Orlando again!

title: Florida Vacation Stay
review: Close to Universal Stuidos with shuttle to the park ( pick up is across the street) Breakfast served daily from 7-10 and the front desk staff is top notch. Helped us find the best price on a rental car, thanks !

title: Awesome stay
review: TL21, Thank you for acknowledging my staff. They work very hard, everyday, to deliver a great guest experience! We thank you for the great review and hope to serve you again in the future!

title: Excellent value very close to parks
review: We chose this hotel because of its location to the highways & Universal Theme parks. You could easily walk to the park within 10 minutes or enjoy the free shuttle. The rooms were large & clean. The pool & hot, although outside, were heated & the kids enjoyed using them. Easy access to 2 highways & multiple shopping plazas & restaurauts. A great choice for a vacation to Orlando!

title: Great place to stay
review: My husband and I enjoyed a night at this Comfort Suites. This hotel is fairly close to Universal Studios and Islands of Adventure in Orlando (about a mile if walking, which we do). The hotel offers a shuttle to Universal and several other parks. The hotel is very clean, the breakfast has a lot of variety, and the staff is extremely helpful and friendly.

title: good option near Universal Studios
review: LakeLady59, Thank you for the nice review of your stay with us. We hope you visit us again soon!

title: Excellent Service
review: This is a very good hotel, near Universal Studios, in a quiet area. Rooms are large, clean and comfortable. Free wi-fi. There is no safe in the room, but you can use a safe in the front desk with no charges. Breakfast with lots of options, but the sitting area is small. Good value.

title: Great hotel
review: LauraAbreu, Thank you for posting a nice review of your stay with us. I certainly understand your point about the breakfast room size. This tends to be a challenge during sold out nights. As long as there is no meeting scheduled we open up the conference room for overflow in the mornings. Thank you for choosing the Comfort Suites!

title: Overall a good value.
review: The staff at the front desk were so very helpful and courteous, and the room was really quiet and comfortable.  It was a great home-away-from-home during our stay in Orlando.  The pool area looked very nice, and it was great to have breakfast included so that we could start our day quickly!

title: Universal Studios Trip
review: Clean hotel.  Shuttle service to and from Universal was good and simple to use.  Hotel staff and shuttle staff very helpful.  Breakfast at hotel was fine.  Hotel was close enough but not to close to Universal.  Lots of things to do in the area.

title: Very convenient if you're visiting Universal theme parks.
review: Rick A, Thank you for the nice review of your stay with us. We take pride in delivering the best guest service possible. We are very lucky to be only 1/4 mile from one of the great theme parks in the World and hope to serve you again in future!

title: Close to universal and sea world
review: We stayed a couple of nights at this hotel which we selected because its so close to Universal theme parks. There's a shuttle available from the hotel across the street which is very convenient and a lot more economical that parking at the parks. The warm breakfast is better than most and starts early enough to get on the first shuttle to the parks and start the day. It is possible to walk to the parks but would probably take about 20-30 minutes and after walking all day the shuttle is definitely more convenient. I highly recommend this hotel

title: Convenient
review: Tina N, Thank you very much for the nice review of our hotel. We think of our property as being very convenient (as you stated) and centrally located to the Theme parks, restaurants and shopping. We hope you come back to see us again!

title: Pretty good, nice employees
review: We stayed here 2 nights in January when we went to discovery cove and sea world.  It is close and convenient to both parks.  The staff is very helpful.  The desk clerk to the time to draw us directions to a nearby Walmart so we could buy Disney cloths at a discounted rate.  I think we saved over $100 from what they were charging at Disney.  The room was clean and fit our family of 5 very well.  The breakfast area was busy but they kept the food stocked and there was plenty of seating.   I would stay again if in the area.

title: Good location for the money - close to Universal & Sea World.
review: A good hotel as far as price. This hotel is very close to Universal Studios (about a mile away). The staff answers questions but doesn't go out of their way to make you feel welcome. Convenience and price make this hotel worth the stay. It is also close to Sea World and Disney. Ask for a "To Go Bag" if you are in a hurry and don't have time for their prepared breakfast. They keep them at the front desk. They consist of a bottled water, Nutri-Grain bar and an apple. Try to get an upgrade if possible. The upgraded rooms are larger and more homey. They have a small business center with 2 computers.

title: Amazing experience.
review: Roanokeborn, We appreciate the nice review of our hotel. I apologize you didn't feel welcomed by the staff upon arrival. I share all reviews, both positive and negative, with my staff to ensure we are maintaining the same level of service for all our guests. I do hope, when you travel to Orlando, you will try us again. Happy New Year and thank you for staying with us!

title: Great customer service
review: We definitely enjoyed our stay in this hotel. The staff is so friendly and very helpful. The room was huge and very clean, so was the bathroom. The breakfast is average but that did not bother us at all. The location is fabulous: Universal Studio is just 2 min (by car); there is a wallgreens across; plenty of restaurants around and the mall is pretty close. We did not go to the swimming pool this time but we will choose this hotel again for next time and will recommend it.

title: Poor customer service of one front desk rep!
review: Mamanoutk, We thank you kindly for the nice review of your stay with us. We look forward to serving you again in the future!

title: Beautifully Kept
review: Booked queen room because none were available on line, but when we arrived inquired about any King rooms available due to cancellations.  Mitesh (front desK) found one for us for 2 days but not on third day.  Kept checking back, and got the same room, saving us the trouble of moving to another room.  Special thanks to Marlene for looking out for us.  The rooms are very spacious and comfortable, and very conviently located.  We have stayed here many times and will keep coming back.

title: Great location, price and hotel
review: Super convenient to Universal Studios, Islands of Adventure, Citywalk and outlets on International Drive.  A nice clean hotel that is perfect for families.  Affordable and good sized rooms.  My family of 4 had no problems.  Free breakfast in the am was as expected, nothing great, but a good quick meal before a day at the parks.

title: Wonderful Stay
review: ADPFlorida, We appreciate the nice review of your stay with us. We take pride in delivering a clean, comfortable suite with great guest service! We hope to see you again

title: Close to Universal
review: I stayed 3 nights in this hotel and it was perfect. We went for Halloween Horror nights, Epcot and Universal Studios and it was very convenient to Universal. You can walk but I highly recommend driving or taking a cab/shuttle to the park as after waiting in lines in the park you will not feel like walking. The hotel also offers free shuttles to the parks in the morning and after hours they will call you a cab which are under $10 to ride to the park which is about the same rate to park. The breakfast was a lot more food than we expected but the quality was so-so. I really only ate the fruit and didn't care for much else of the selection. I didn't utilize the pool or hot tub as I was too tired to move after being in the parks all day. Overall a great stay!

title: Wonderful Location; Great Staff; Clean and roomy
review: Cindy943, Thank you for choosing the Comfort Suites for your lodging needs! We realize there are many hotels in Orlando to choose from, so we try and deliver the best service possible by listening to our guests. I'm happy to hear we met your expectations!

title: Still a super hotel
review: I'm a little late in writing this review but I booked this hotel for a one night stay when we drove down to Orlando to do Islands of Adventure.  The price was decent, it is a 5 minute drive to Universal, it was clean, my room had two queen beds and a pull out sofa, tv, mini fridge, coffee maker and wifi.  in the morning they have breakfast in the lobby.  Eggs, sausage, a waffle station, a cereal station, coffee/tea station but limited seating.  That didnt bother us since the kids brought their breakfast back to the room while we finished getting ready packing up. I dont see how you can walk to Universal from this hotel but again i didn't even attempt it.  I would definitely stay here again when visiting Orlando.

title: We all loved it...
review: Went there with the family because we wanted to spend time at Universal Studio.  We choose this hotel because of the location and price.  Hotel is close enought to Universal Studio that you can walk to go there.  My wife found out that 5 min from there (other side of I-4 on International Dr.), she could go shop a bit to the Orlando Premium Outlets.  Definitely a plus.  Hotel was clean and quiet (what a surprise for an hotel in that area).  Only thing that bother me a bit was the outside whirlpool.  The water was so hot that we could get in.  Too bad because after a couple days walking all day long at Universal Studio, I would have liked jumping in.

title: Best value for money
review: Mario D, Thank you for the nice review of our hotel. I apologize for the hot tub, we have since checked the temperature and made some slight adjustments. We hope you visit us again!!

title: Good location for universal
review: The room had 2 queen beds, pullout couch, mini-fridge & microwave. Clean which is the most important feature for us. Spacious. This was a 1 of 6 hotels we stayed in as part of our 2 week vacation in Florida. I say this was the best 'room' we stayed in. Decor is basic, so maybe not the best looking hotel. Eating breakfast at 9am means you may not get a seat but anytime before that seems to be good. Hot items like eggs & sausages, waffles, along with the standard breakfast items. Liked the ample supply of fresh fruits. There was never a shortage of anything. Not sure how the eggs are made but suspect it comes from a carton. Wireless in the room was slow.   It was hot hot hot, plus knowing we were going to be at Universal the whole day, we decided to drive and pay for the parking…

title: Perfect
review: TAFanToronto, We appreciate the kind review of your stay with us. We do our very best to make sure all our guests leave with a smile on their face! Thank you!

title: Very clean, good location...
review: We stayed at comfort suites for two weeks in August the reason we picked this hotel it so we could walk to universal and save on the parking fee's, we used the shuttle for seaword and aquatica, location ok near a wendy's mc'donalds burger king also five mins walk to orlando ale house and walgreens for supplys drinks etc. We were only the fourth floor room large clean and good air con not a lot of storage though for a family staying two weeks only a small wardrobe a three draws, but we had iron & board fridge hairdryer which was great,there was two queen beds but five little pillows my husband hated these small pillows and could'nt wait to get back to a normal size at home the hotel also has a guest laundry on the third floor i used this twice only $1.50 for a large wash and…

title: nice hotel, great staff
review: We spent 6 nights in this hotel that we chose first for its closeness to Universal (you could walk there if there was a sidewalk all the way and no freeway to cross). The staff was very nice and welcoming, the rooms were huge (a real suite) with 2 comfortable double beds and a couch, there was also a fridge, a micro wave and a small dining table. Breakfast was great with delicious fresh waffles every morning (you made them yourself) but it was kind of crowded even though we were there in late october. The swimming pool was too cold (but again it was not summer) but the hot tub was nice. The shuttle was convenient (contrary to what universal says however the shuttle does not operate from the comfort suite but from the hotel nextdoor) but it took 30 min while it is only 2 miles…

title: Great place to stay while at Universal Studios
review: Marion D, Thank you very much for the nice review of your stay with us. I'm glad to hear we met your expectations and the family enjoyed themselves. We hope you visit us again!

title: Super place to stay
review: This hotel was great. The service was excellent, our room was roomy, well maintained and super comfortable and the hot breakfast was good. We chose to stay here while going to Unviersal Studios. we are an active family (2 adults, 1 6yr old) so we decided to walk to and from the park each day. There was a shuttle available at a neighbouring hotel but after looking into it decided it was not worth the hassle. This shuttle is ran by Unviersal and the hotels have not control over it.  The walk was approximately 25 mins. 15 mins from the hotel to the entrance of Universal and then about 10 mins to walk thru the entrance & City Walk to get to the actual park entrance. It was an easy enjoyable walk. The only real disappointment was that the pool closed at 10pm. Since we closed the park…

title: Close-Clean-Comfortable-Considerate-Courteous
review: Lisa L, We appreciate you sharing your experience with the traveling public. I was very glad to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and we hope you will return soon. Thank you!

title: Great hotel, reasonable price, and super location if you're going to Universal Studios
review: Staff was super friendly , hotel rooms were immaculate, clean ,breakfast was good  I have been a choice club member for a few years now and stayed at many of them up and down the east coast and this one by far was the best .... doing a great job keep it up....I will be back again  and bring more family with me next time

title: Our stay at this hotel was good
review: We went to Universal studios and decided to stay at this hotel, it is centric and the parking and internet are complementary. I think is well maintained and the breakfast is fine , kind of the same items everyday .i  guess to offer cut fruits might be a little more expensive. If you good early for breakfast the lines are very short and you can make many waffles without people waiting behind you. The pool is ok as well the gym. The room was nice and spacious, you have to make sure that  you tell the maid to come and make your room in time, they leave at 3 pm, which it is reasonable. They have laundry facilities onsite which is nice, just the dryer didn't dry very well.  Otherwise great service and nice.

title: Wonderful Hotel!
review: Bleu27,  We appreciate the kind review of our hotel. I was glad to see you enjoyed yourself while visiting Universal Orlando. I do apologize for the dryer as we have corrected the issue since your stay. Thank you again and hope to see you in the future!

title: What didn't go wrong
review: Very clean, great breakfast, friendly staff and perfect location for Universal, SeaWorld, and Disney parks!

title: exceptional for the area
review: Julietrevor,  Thank you for the nice review of your stay with us. We strive everyday to deliver the best possible service for our guests. We look forward to serving you in the future!

title: Great hotel
review: Honestly, I wanted to like this hotel. The staff was truly nice and welcoming, though the elevator and my room carpet was not exactly clean. On the first night, I found my phone msg light blinking.  I left, and came in late to find a nice note from the staff that they would move me because they were unable to move me.  However, it was 3AM so I went to bed.. my bad.  On my second night, I was going to shower and found water pooled in the tub, and the tub feeling slick.  I called and they sent up a guy, who said that the finish had been scratched in cleaning.   I asked for a wake up call on the third morning.. and apparently whatever made my phone blink, made it not ring. The final morning I was showering, I had not put down the towel that I did with all the other days.  I reached…

title: Nice hotel Friendly Staff
review: I recently had booked the Quality Suites in Orlando and the hotel was awful.  I checked out early and came here.  They were very friendly Marlene let us see the rooms before we booked and she even let us check in early.  Breakfast was good and always replenished quickly.  Abdellah works the night service and he is also very friendly and helpful.  I felt very comfortable and will stay there next time we are in Orlando.  Newly remodeled rooms are also nice.

title: BACK Again!   And very glad to be back again!
review: Michelle D, Thank you for the fantastic review of your stay with us! I appreciate you recognizing Marlene who does a wonderful job with our guests. Please keep us in mind when you decide to travel to Orlando again, we are here to serve.

title: All around great place!!!
review: I booked Comfort Suites / Major Blvd again for our 2012 Orlando visit.   I LOVE the room configuration (2 Double beds plus pull out sofa) as well as the microwave/refrigerator combo.  PLUS the Free Breakfast buffet!    We had a 12 hour drive that took a bit longer than expected.  I called in and reminded them that we were arriving and that I requested adjoining suites.    We arrived at 5am on Saturday 5/26/12.   We got the Adjoining suites that we requested and that was a HUGE Relief with our party which included:  ME46, DH47, DS20, DSGF19, DSD19 and DSD18.   Hubs, myself and son had one room and the 3 girls had the other.   Despite driving in early... I was up with Hubs at 9:30.... barely in time to enjoy the free breakfast.   However we had plenty to eat and the staff did not…

title: Near Universal parks
review: The Baton Rouge Family,   I can't thank you enough for the wonderful review of your stay with us. I'm so happy to see you enjoyed your stay. We are a guest service driven staff who's only job is to serve you. We will look forward to your next visit!

title: EXCELLENT HOTEL!
review: Amazing, amazing staff!!! They were all so nice and very helpful!!! Breakfast buffet each morning was a plus with lots of variety!! Hotel was very nice and clean, rooms were nice and big with extra sleeper sofa which was a plus. Beds were comfortable, internet service was great, all around a super place to stay with the family and we will being staying here again the next time we are in Orlando. Highly recommend!!!

title: JUST RIGHT
review: We arrived at Orlando International Airport at 3.30pm and this hotel was 10 minutes from there, we were due to go on a weeks trip so this was convenient just for the night.  Nice hotel, clean, comfortable bed and not too noisy although there were some commings and goings during the night but not bad at all.  Plenty of parking as there was a huge car park.  The morning breakfast was excellent.  This hotel is near a really busy road but no traffic noise in the room at all and it was only about 3 miles from many excellent places to eat also only about 10 minutes at the most from Universal Studios/Islands of Adventure and International Drive.  This is a great hotel for one or two nights stay.

title: Great Hotel Close To Universal And I-Drive
review: Goodhandbag,  Thank you very much for the nice review of our hotel. Our guests are our #1 priority. I use all feedback both positive and negative to train my managers and staff to ensure we are delivering the best possible service. We look forward to serving you again!

title: A Serendipitous Switch
review: Our first hotel was not as advertised. We moved to this hotel on the third day of our vacation. Sandy at the front desk was great, she answered all our questions and went out of her way to make our check in and stay as pleasant as possible. I have a medical condition that requires us to travel with special equipment, she made it very easy to get it in the room. The room was clean and large, everything was in good condition. Breakfast was very good with the food fresh and well stocked, the attendant was friendly and did a great job keeping up with crowd. The only problems we saw were: the dryer in the laundry didn't have much heat,  clothes didn't dry very much, and the left waffle iron broke each morning. Otherwise we were very pleased with our stay and would stay here again.

title: Great Hotel,Staff & Vacations.
review: kirk C, Thank you very much for the nice review of our hotel! Sandy is my "guest service guru" and does and excellent job of taking care of our guests. I apologize for the dryer and waffle iron, both of those issues have been rectified. We look forward to serving you again in the future!

title: A Wonderful Experience
review: Reservations at the La Quinta Inn were secured weeks ahead by credit card. I thought that guaranteed our late arrival. It did not. "No one answered the phone when I called," said the clerk so we cancelled the reservation." (Of course no one answered; I was on the airplane.) This is not the welcome one desires 9:30 PM for a party of 6 seeking 2 rooms. She sent me next door to Comfort Suites. In contrast to the chaos of guests milling about the La Quinta reception area, things were calm and quiet. Yes, 2 adjoining suites were available. Staff was courteous and efficient. Though we were moved to a lower floor the next day to avoid the influx of a herd of high school age performers moving in, we felt fortunate to have landed in this more organized hotel. The rooms and hallways were…

title: Great value as usual
review: Stayed here for 2 nights whilst visiting Universal Studios. As usual the suite was large, well furnished, clean and comfortable. The breakfast was OK and all in all great value for money. Would definately stay here again.

title: Not So Good
review: Davylynne, Thank you for the nice review of our hotel. We take great pride in delivering a clean, comfortable room with great service. We look forward to serving you in the future!

title: Budget hotel with great facilities
review: Check in hotel early and was greated right away! That went good, but when I was leaving the room to step out for the day, the door was not closing right the house keepers response was that we had a DND on the door and no one will enter the room. :( We then went to the front desk and got it fix right away. On the 2nd night of our stay, the air was making a load noise around 3am. At check out I went down stairs and let the front desk know that the air needed to be cleaned because it was making a load noise, her response was that we should have changed rooms. IM SORRY but at 3am I am not changing rooms. I was not looking for a free night I was letting them know so it could be fixed.

title: Outstanding Value and 2 Traffic Signals from Universal
review: Johanna C,  I'm sorry to read that your stay with us was not up to your standards. I'm sorry your door and Air conditioning was not working properly, but was glad to see maintenance took care of the issue. Its quit possible that, even though all my room attendants speak english as a second language, she may not have understood the statement. I have since discussed your comments with my executive housekeeper to ensure our room attendants are responding in an appropriate matter and, if they for some reason do not understand, to send the guest to a staff member who does. Regarding the AC unit, my night auditor should have documented the case for maintenance in the morning and offered a room change. We understand if you do not want to move so early in the morning, but that is something we will always offer. Again I'm very sorry and I hope you will choose us again in the future, considering you are not to far away.

title: Great Location By Universal
review: We spent the Orlando leg of our Grand US tour here and found the hotel to be excellent for the price range. The rooms are big with two queen beds and a sofa bed (at no extra cost, other Comfort hotels want $10 for a rollaway). Everything is spotlessly clean and there is also a pool and laundry on site. The theme parks are not in walking distance in my opinion, but there is an excellent and cheap I-Ride trolley bus service that will take you to the door of all of them for $2 a ride or you can get a pass which is cheaper. There is a lmiited range of restaurants nearby but again the I-ride will take you to International Drive where the choice is endless.

title: Decent hotel for the price, but poor customer service!
review: We booked this hotel for our Universal/Seaworld vacation. Location is very close to the parks and there are restaurants in the area. Pool is small, but it was big enough to cool off in and was clean. Room was clean, but were were on the first floor and each morning at 2:00 we were woken up by the neighboring hotel sprinkler which would turn on and spray our window every five minutes for an hour. This was not a mist but a high pressure stream of water which was very annoying! I spoke with the front desk clerk who said they said they could not adjust the neighboring hotels sprinkler, but agreed to give us another room once one became available, three days later. When I asked about a discount I was told that they could not offer me one, and that no one ever complained about this…

title: Easy Access to Universal Studios
review: Cron J, We appreciate you posting a review of your experience at our hotel. Thank you for noticing that we are a clean hotel in great proximity to Universal Studios. As you already know, I was well aware of this issue and it has since been rectified. Our neighbor next door took full responsibility for the sprinkler head. I apologize that my staff did not bring this to my attention earlier. I have since discussed this case with my managers and staff to make sure guest concerns do not fall through the cracks. I try to stay engaged with all my guests to ensure a clean and comfortable stay at my hotel. I was happy to have worked out the issue with you personally and hope you visit us again in the future!

title: Definitely one of our first choices!
review: I stayed here on a whim. I was coming back in town to start my travels out of state and wanted to hang out for a few hours before leaving town. I got one of the closest hotels to Universal so I could go to City Walk. I will say I was impressed. My room was very nice but I do expect this from a Comfort Suites property. The staff was nice and patient with me even though  I was rushing them :-). They also recognized my Diamond status with Choice Privileges with a water and a snack..... :-).. For a second I thought I was at a hilton property lol. I was very thankful for that because normally Choice Hotels give you a pat on the back and just say thanks. They are more into rewarding you with points than snacks and beverages at least from what I have seen at various locations. Anyways,…

title: Very handy location
review: 247hardworker, thank you for the nice review of our hotel. I'm glad my staff recognized your diamond status with Choice Hotels. We are very lucky as we get many diamond, gold and platinum Choice Privileges Members who decide to stay with us. We recongize our guests, because we know if we do, you will come back to visit us again!

title: Fantastic stay! So close to everything!
review: Had a horrible experience this past weekend with another Choice hotel, which has really encouraged me to write this review about the Comfort Suites!  May I say first and foremost that Eric Krakowski and Sandy are both great managers and very helpful and accomodating!  Eric was unfortunately not in this past weekend when we had our horrible experience with the Quality Suites on Turkey Lake, but Sandy stepped right up and helped us out greatly in his absence!  Normally our first choice is this hotel, but unfortunately they were all booked up for the two nights we were planning our stay this past weekend.  Needless to say, several hundred dollars later and a lot of inconvenience, we ended up having to leave the hotel we booked at and stay at two seperate hotels (the first night of…

title: Great for a family with teenagers
review: The room was lovely and spacious with a lot of nice touches. I appreciated having a large mini fridge to put pop and leftovers in, and the teenagers in the family enjoyed having the sofa bed so that they didn't have to share a bed. The pool was nice although it was a little cold when we were there. Breakfast was typical continental with eggs and bacon on the side, i didn't try the eggs because they looked like pancakes, however SO said they were edible and the bacon was very good. If eggs and bacon are not your thing there were many other options, cereal, yogurt, english muffins, toast, donuts, danishes and waffles. We didn't use the shuttle to the park because the schedule was to limited for our needs and we had early admission to IOA, so we drove ourselves. The location was…

title: Enjoyable stay
review: RachealF_12,   Thank you for the great review of our hotel! I'm so glad you and your family had a good time visiting Orlando. Please keep us in mind for your future lodging needs!

title: Nice hotel
review: We had an enjoyable stay at this property fro 3 nights prior to catching a Panama Canal Cruise out of Tampa. While here we visited Universal Studios which is very close by and drove to Epcot which is fairly easy to drive to from here.  We had a renovated room that was in very good condition and clean. The staff was very attentive and helpful. Breakfast was nothing spactacular but hit the right spot with standard choice hotel breakfast fare - eating area was well maintained and clean.  Parking area was spacious and not crowded.

title: Good value, very close to Harry Potter!
review: Swarthout, We appreciate the nice review of our hotel. We definitely take pride in delivering top notch guest service along with a clean and comfortable suite. We hope to see you again!

title: Clean, modern and polite
review: Nice clean hotel,   helpful staff,  good location.

title: Perfect for visiting Universal Orlando
review: Although our stay was short (one night), will definitely go back the next time we are in Orlando.  Tops for cleanliness, spacious suite, and amenities.

title: Great Hotel
review: Diane039, Thank you very much for the nice comments regarding your stay with us! We take pride in being a guest service centered hotel that provides a clean room and all the amenities you will need.  We look forward to serving you again!

title: Perfect hospitality - part one and part two
review: The hotel was just perfect for us, it was near from Universal Studios(walking distance at least for us, about 15 minutes walk against $50 for parking). Near also from shopping center. Great breakfast, excellent breakfast, nice customer service. The room has an extra sofa bed which was perfect for us. Great internet service. I really recommend it.

title: Just a few minor issues
review: Tatiana,  Thank you very much for the wonderful review of our hotel. We are a great destination hotel for folks traveling to the Universal Area. We take pride in providing our guests with a clean, comfortable room and a full breakfast to get your day started right! We will look forward to your next visit!

title: Excellent value loved Hotel
review: I have being at Comfort Suites twice. (May and December of 2011). My husband and I spent our vacation (on May, 2011) in States. My sister and my nephew joinned me there for X-Mas. Our major demands concerning hotels are: hygiene and safety. Not only we have found those items in here but we also received the best hospitality ever. Everyone is polite, well trainned and work as a team. From the kitchen to the manager (Mr. Eric) and the receptionist (major thanks to Marlene!) they are all prepare to provide you the best stay. I could see some new furniture, equipaments and structure changes (improvements). The showers are great, specially when you come home from a tired day at the parks. Parking is easy, free and safe, the room is well suited (now with some new flat screen Tvs) and…

title: Great Value Super Close to Universal
review: We stayed here for 4 nights very comfortably with a family of four in one room.  The rooms were clean and comfortable.  We had two double beds as well as a sleeper sofa so our son & daughter were thrilled not to have to share a bed.  A small fridge, microwave, coffee maker, and free wifi were included.  The breakfast buffet had many choices including fresh waffles and eggs.  The best part was that it was so conveniently located to Universal.  We bought the package through Universal and were able to go to Islands of Adventure an hour early which was very nice.   The only drawbacks were that the free shuttle leaves from another hotel and only runs once a day and that breakfast isn't served until 7:00.   Overall, it was a very nice value.

title: We Loved this Hotel!
review: I'm so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us! We are a great location for vacationers coming to visit Universal Studios as we are only 1/4 mile to the maingate. We take great pride in delivering a top notch breakfast for our guests as we know you will need your energy for the parks! We will look forward to seeing you again!

title: Close to the action of Universal
review: We stayed 7 nights last October. We simply loved it! The room was large, clean and with new furniture and beds. The breakfast was excellent! Great staff (specially Sandy!). Near of Universal and International Drive but in a quiet area. We definitely will book again this hotel for our 2012 vacation!

title: Recommended for family, close to Universal Studio
review: Juliane C, I'm so thrilled you enjoyed your stay with us! Sandy is my Front Office Manager and always delivers great service for our guests! We will look forward to your arrival in 2012!

title: Great stay at  the hotel
review: We stayed at the Comfort Suites Universal Studio Area on July of 2011. We are a family of 5 and we really enjoyed the space in the room.  Keep in mind, we spent most of our time in the parks, not in the room... Staff was frendly, room was clean. Breakfast was good, but a little crowded.   Shuttles to the parks are excellent and dependable but you need to be aware that they leave from the Holliday Inn next door and you must have made reservations at the counter located in this hotel (not at the Comfort Suites).  We were the first stop to go to the parks, so we always had a seat in the morning.  Downside: last to come back at night... Comfort Suites Universal Studios Area is well worth considering if you plan a trip to Universal Studios.

title: Service & Quality!
review: We stayed two nights at this hotel while visiting Universal Studios. The staff at the hotel could not have been more helpful. They gave us great advice on attractions, greeted us warmly, always had a smile on. They were able to provide us with bell service for our bags even after checkout, which helped us to relax and enjoy our day. There was a shuttle service, but it did not have very frequent runs, so we opted to drive our rental car to the park and walk back if one of us decided to stay at the park later/leave early. It was a very manageable, with crosswalks and well maintained sidewalks. We did qualify for early park entry on both days because this hotel is a Universal partner. The breakfasts offered something for everyone, and included several healthy choices, which were…

title: Nice hotel in a great location.
review: raeann74, we thank you for choosing us! We realize there are many hotels in Orlando to choose from when deciding on lodging for your vacation. We also understand there are many hotels that offer the same amenities as we do. We try to stand out amongst the competition by delivering top notch customer service as we feel a personal touch can go a long way. We appreciate you choosing us and will look forward to seeing you in the future!

title: Comfortable and Convenient
review: Family of 4 on a trip to Universal Studios. Close to the park, about ¼ mile 23 minute walk (with 6 and 9 year-old) from front door to City Walk.  Cab fare 6-8 dollars each way.  We took a cab back each night. Hotel happy to call cab for you.  Friendly and helpful staff. Cost to and from airport about $50 with tip.   Room (mostly the bathroom) initially smelled like smoke and requested new towels and linens for the next day and they came in, changed everything (yes I checked) and the room smelled fine.  Room was clean each day, TV had 60 channels, wakeup call system worked fine,  Breakfast.  Each day had coffee, OJ, apple juice, whole milk, 2% milk to drink and some fresh fruit.  Some days were donuts and danishes, other days had muffins.  Yogurt and waffles each day. Egg…

title: great hotel and staff
review: tcoolhand, thank you very much for the fantastic review of our hotel! We definitely take pride in delivering a clean and comfortable room with excellent service. We will look forward to your next arrival!

title: Comfort Suites - Orlando
review: We booked our Universal vacation through AAA and got a good deal on the Comfort Suites.  Every room has 2 beds, a small "living area" with a pull out couch and table, a microwave and mini-fridge.  The bathroom was rather small, but okay for the two of us.  We asked for rooms close to our traveling companions and the hotel gave us room a few doors away from each other.  The free breakfast was typical Comfort Inn fare - some kind of eggs and meat, make your own waffles, fruit, cereal, baked goods.  Everything was fresh and tasty. There is free wireless internet and a nice size TV.  There is an outdoor pool and a hot tub (lukewarm water!!). The people at the front desk were very helpful and friendly. The hotel is advertised as being within walking distance to Universal - I guess it…

title: Walking to Universal?  You could stay here
review: As two adults looking to stay within walking distance to the Universal Studios parks, I searched high and low for advice.  I didn't find much, so I want to share what I learned after our visit.    Hotel PROs: Clean room of good size, quiet, has been remodeled recently.  Beds were comfy and the front desk was helpful.  Free hot breakfast (eggs, sausage) whether you paid for that upgrade or not.    Hotel CONS: Freakishly small pillows.  Taxi from hotel to airport will cost you $45 with tip (they wont tell you this when you ask to call a cab; ask for a Yellow Cab.) Coffee was TERRIBLE.    About walking: If you look at a map, it is hard to tell where the parks really start and how far this is from the hotels.  Its further than it looks.  This hotel was at the very edge of what I…

title: Started off iffy but ended up tremendous.
review: Sierra, we appreciate the review of our hotel. It seemed you had a good time and that is what we shoot for everyday! Guest satisfaction is our #1 priority! I was sorry to hear you did not like the pillows or coffee. Both are part of the required brand standards of Choice Hotels International. But even so, your feedback will not be forgotten. Any feedback, both positive and negative, are necessary for us to continue improving so we can provide the best possible service for our guests. We hope to see you again in your future travels!

title: Great Place to stay!!!!
review: My wife and I wanted to take a trip just the two of us.  We have 4 kids 7 years old and under.  We decided to make Universal Studios our vacation destination. We arrived on Friday night.  We were on our flight at dinner time and wanted to get straight to our hotel so we planned on eating after we got to our hotel and settled.  We also wanted to make a late night walk to Universal Studios to see how far of a walk it would be.  We were greated by two friendly employees who checked us into the hotel.  We went to our room, got settled and left the room to find something to eat and walk to the park.  We closed the door to our room and turned around to make sure it was locked and it popped right open.  The door was broken.  We told the front desk who made us wait for maintanence to…

title: A very nice surprise...
review: Dear Jeff S, Thank you very much for the great review of our Comfort Suites! We are a great destination hotel for folks coming to Universal Studios. I apologize for the door issue you had, but was glad to see my staff responded quickly. Our renovation is almost complete, so we look forward to you coming back and staying with us!  Thanks again!

title: Great location for access to Universal Studios
review: My two friends and I stay at the Comfort Suites for 4 nights and found this hotel to be a great place to stay. The room recently remodeled was modern, clean and spacious. The beds were so comfortable.  We arrived at 10 am and they were able to put us in a room so we could start our adventures at Universal/Harry Potter right away.  Every member of the staff was friendly, helpful and very accommodating.  The breakfast in the morning was plentiful with a great variety of food. We have an excellent stay and would definitely recommend this hotel to others.  We'll be back!  3HarryPotterFans

title: Great stay, will definitely stay here again.
review: This hotel was great from the moment we arrived. The breakfast in the morning was plentiful, always clean and had a good selection - just what you need before you head off for a long day at the parks. The seating area is quite small so i recommend getting there early. The room we were given was a renovated room (they are undergoing renovations at the moment) and it was was very clean, good size,couch, fridge, microwave, etc.   The front desk attendants were very helpful, they called us cabs everyday to get to the parks and it was only a short 5 minute wait. You can easily walk to Universal, its about a 20 minute walk. We chose to take a cab for $7 because we would already be doing a lot of walking at Universal.   The pool area was clean, lots of towels and loungers to relax on.…

title: Nice Room
review: Thank you for the nice review of our hotel! We are almost complete with our renovation and the property looks fantastic. We are looking forward to giving our guests a new and improved Comfort Suites with all the amenities you would need to make your vacation a pleasant one!  We will look forward to serving you again!

title: THIS HOTEL WAS THE BEST OUT OF THE FEW WE STAYED AT
review: The room is clean and nice. with most of the things you need.

title: Convenient, friendly, comfortable, and the price is ok
review: Thank you for staying with us! We are almost complete with our renovation, so please think about us for your future travel!

title: Mom, dad, and son on their way to the Keys, stop for the night."
review: We stayed in the U.S for 3 weeks and stayed in 4 different hotels. Overall I would say this was the best hotel taking into account price, service, facilities on offer. We stayed here for  3 nights at the beginning of August before going on to Port Canaveral. We used the outdoor pool which was great, there was free internet access and free wifi in room. The breakfast in the mornings was a great start to set you up for the day. The bedrooms were huge even for our family of five. Free parking a bonus. Self use Laundry facilities (you can buy detergent from reception for $1). However, I must compliment the staff for their service- nothing was too much trouble. If we ever go to Orlando again, this hotel would be my only choice. ( Note; We also stayed at Floridays).

title: LOVED IT WILL STAY AGAIN
review: been traveling to florida for 20 years stayed many hotels this one was good  close to international drive clean friendly served nice snacks if anything broke in the room it was fixed promptly we enjoyed our stay although it needs more loungers at the pool better internet connection and a bar  you cant complain as the room rental is affordable and better than some hotels we have stayed in  we will be back again hope it dosnt change to much

title: Great Hotel, Great Location, Great Service
review: Thank you for the nice review of our hotel! The internet issue was resolved this week, so the signal strength is back to normal and we will review the number of lounge chairs at our pool area. We appreciate all feedback from our guests, because this only helps us get better!

title: Clean and comfortable
review: We will always choose Comfort Suites when we visit Universal Studios. The location is so close you can almost walk. A very good breakfast is included and the staff is helpful and friendly. Most important; The rooms are clean and nicely decorated. A+

title: Clean, affordable, easy to get to and near the action
review: Thank you so much for the great review of our hotel! We have begun our renovation last week and will be replacing all furniture and carpet, repainting building and suites and will be showcasing a new design and decor. We would love to have you back!

title: decent place,clean and reasonable.
review: The hotel staff called our room after check in to make sure that everything was O.K.  The shuttle that is advertised for Universal Studio is actually not located at the hotel.  You have to walk to the Holiday Inn to catch the shuttle.  This is a little deceiving.

title: Very Satisfied =)
review: Booked two rooms for six adults and one child for our park to park Universal Studios and Island of Adventures vacation from 06/29/11 thru 07/03/11. We were pleasantly suprised to learn that the interior doors in each of our adjoining rooms could be opened to make one "massive" suite! The rooms were very clean, the beds were very comfortable, the staff was very courteous & helpful, the swimming pool & spa were awesome and the variety of complimentary breakfast foods were very fresh and filling!  Would definitely stay again...

title: Great mini-suite accommodations only two minutes from Universal Orlando.
review: Thank you very much for the great review of our hotel. Your kind words brought a big smile to my face this morning! I and my entire team are ready to serve you again in the future. Thank you for staying with us.

title: Great motel, helpful staff, good value
review: We stayed in two rooms, seven adults. The mini-suites were large enough for all of us to have our luggage, and still sit down to relax. Thee hotel is in excellent condition, and immaculately kept up. The price was reasonable - on par with others. It has a nice Swimming pool and hot tub, and a hot breakfast complete with several flavors of waffles, scrambled eggs and sausages. But above all, the staff really makes this place superb.  From the time I entered to check in until we left - and even to my phone call the next day to see if they had the cell phone charger I had left behind (they did) - the staff was cheerful, solicitous and a lot of fun. That added a lot to the experience for everyone. I have stayed at least a dozen different hotels of different levels in Orlando,most of…

title: Good for the Price
review: Another happy guest, this is what makes my job such a joy! Thank you for the kind words about our hotel. Looking at your profile picture, I believe we talked one morning during your stay? Please remember us when your future travels bring you back to Orlando!

title: Great service, clean rooms, and great breakfast
review: We traveled to this motel to attend a nearby conference.  We were a group of 33 teenagers and adults.  From the initial planning stages throughout our stay the staff at the motel was more than helpful.  They assisted us with any problems and went above and beyond our expectations in many ways.  The motel itself was clean and a good value for the cost.  We enjoyed the breakfast bar and the variety of food that was offered.  Staying at this hotel helped make the trip a positive experience for our group.  We would certainly stay at this motel again if we travel to Orlando.

title: Great property for families
review: We stayed here for three nights over Memorial Day weekend.  The room had two queen beds and a sofa sleeper.   There was also a mini fridge and a microwave.  The room didn't feel cramped like a normal hotel room does.  Breakfast was good and was stocked frequently.  It was quite crowded so they opened up an extra meeting room for people to sit and eat breakfast.   We had a very quiet stay and didn't encounter any noise from patrons in other rooms.  Would definitely stay here again.

title: Not as advertised
review: Thank you so much for the kind review of our hotel! We take pride in being a family friendly lodging desination for folks visiting the Orlando Universal area. We look forward to serving you in the future!

title: Very Clean and Nice
review: We selected this hotel for 2 reasons: it was one of the "Universal partner" hotels, and it was a suite (we had 3 adults).  First, it wasn't really a suite - just a slightly larger regular hotel room, with a lousy pull out couch.  The pull out was too uncomfortable for anyone to sleep on, so we ended up not using it.
